programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry. Whether its CEOs, professors or politicians, each offer their forthright opinions on the financial positives and negatives across the USA, evaluating the significance of the present climate and how they believe the country can continue to improve.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Take a look at the latest news in finance, economics and investment, most important business stories and the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics. Find out everything you need to know about stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities in Bloomberg Surveillance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco, California, and Caroline Hyde in New York, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

programme.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
programme.desc: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloombergs Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. However they accidentally leave it at school, and take home a clump of Principal Browns hair instead. Surprisingly they discover it makes an excellent pet! When they realise they have left the real Chris Morris at school, they have to race to find him before their error is discovered.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. Darwin gets jealous and sets out to dig some dirt on Penny, hoping it will split them up. Meanwhile Gumball is planning to step his and Pennys relationship up a notch, by proposing marriage!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry. When they call to complain about their late pizza its the final straw for Larry and he quits all of his jobs. Elmores fragile commercial structure collapses and the citizens revert to a more primitive apocalyptic state.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The whole town embrace this festival and get excited about the arrival of the Sluzzle Dude; leaving it to Gumball and Anais to keep everyones Sluzzle Tag dreams alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. Miss Simian warns them about the Butterfly Effect whereby the flap of an insects wings can start a tornado on the other side of the world. Paying no heed, Gumball releases the emergent butterfly into the wild, where it causes havoc upon Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. They discover that a mysterious person has been secretly living in their home. Gumball and Darwin manage to turn this confused squatter into their mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When they find one that depicts Gumball running naked through the mall, Gumball is determined not to let it come to pass. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. Gumball and Darwin help Anais make up an imaginary friend who, much to all their surprise, appears in front of them. Gumball and Darwin teach Anais and her new friend how to become friends, but soon realise that he might not be so imaginary after all...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Dad gives Larrys Hairdressers a bad review for saying hes bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing-spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review. Just because the customer is always right doesnt mean that what theyre doing isnt wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Tag / The Party / The Man / The Microwave
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party, and have to bring a date! / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumballs past that brings down his grade point average. This means he has to retake kindergarten all over again, much to her delight. But by demoting him Miss Simian has inadvertently brought herself down, and theyre left with no choice but to team up if they want things back to normal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover the reason Dads diet wasnt working was that he was actually on ten diets: and eating a meal for each of them. They eventually manage to help him lose weight, but Richards newfound buffness also brings out his more obnoxious side.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When people that barely know each other start falling in love, Gumball thinks he knows whos behind it. He rushes to Sarahs house and finds her writing in a magic notebook that turns everything in it into reality. When everything in Elmore gets crazier and crazier theres only one thing for it: they have to write their way out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid, which has led to a serious medical condition.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After accidentally bumping into each other in the grocery aisle, Nicole and her parents have it out. The Wattersons discover why Nicole and her parents havent been on speaking terms for so long. The kids decide to bring about a reunion, in order to secure that backlog of birthday and holiday presents...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Nicole decides to pay the cable bill in person at Chanax, she leaves specific instructions for Richard to stay in the car. However hes far too tempted by the vending machine in the foyer to follow her advice. Chanax believes Richard is their mysterious founder and follow his every whim, leading to their inevitable demise.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are at the convenience store considering playing truant. Larry warns them that if they dont take their education seriously theyll end up like him. To prove his point, Larry lets Gumball and Darwin work some of his many roles to make them appreciate the value of a good education.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe Shorts
programme.desc: A formidable king of the deep drags Ivandoe and Bert to the bottom of his lake.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Courtneys attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.sub-title: Say Hello to My Little Friends
programme.desc: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: The hottest day of the year and a broke air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Cody is set to inherit a video hame empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. programme.desc: Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society that gives preferential treatment to its own members. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad has to make the kids on time for their first day back at school. But hes overslept and now he cant find Gumball, Darwin or Anais anywhere. He sets about retracing his steps from the day before, to work out where they might be. When he finally figures out where they are, its a race against time to rescue them and prove to himself - and Mum - that hes not a bad father.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom wins Employee of the Month at the Rainbow factory, Richard feels like he is never celebrated for all the work he does at home. Nicole is suspicious of how much he actually does, but when Richard goes on strike, his important role in keeping things under control becomes painfully clear...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.desc: Gossamer invites The Looney Builders on a camping trip. They plan to build a simple campsite until Daffy insists they go "glamping" instead.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Marvin the Martian and his Martian crew a space station.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvesters back.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk, Lilit ja Kubarapoiss paastavad linnumuna mardikate kaest ning toimetavad selle kenasti linnuema juurde tagasi.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss sõbruneb pisimutukaga, kes kardab lennata. Kas tal õnnestub uus sõber lennuhirmust ule aidata?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Sušimuši lusikas laheb katki ja ta otsustab soogitegemisest loobuda. Kas Kubarapoiss, Lilit ja Sepp suudavad kokaameti enda õlule võtta või tuleb Sušikubar kuidagi vana ameti peale tagasi meelitada?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean cant get any sleep! / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge - to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little "pimping" …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out - and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers - a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back…

programme.desc: Tana aitavad Lilit, Kubarapoiss ja Mikk-Mikk Tossul hirmust võitu saada.

programme.desc: Seenemikud nuputavad, kuidas mao kaest Liliti lendav taldrik katte saada.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After failing Wilhelmina for the last time Frank and Lyman are stripped of their wings and replaced. Meanwhile their wings attach themselves to Lion and Scarecrow. Dorothy has to make things right or Frank and Lyman are Wingmen No More.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy uses some Kansas know how to corral a dangerous mob of creatures known as Hammerheads before they can destroy Emerald Citys new museum.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch gives Ozmas unfunny Jester a laughing charm, which leaves Dorothy and crew helpless with hysterics.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Sisterhood of the Witch discovers the Wicked Witch has lost her powers, a rival witch takes over her castle and now the Wicked Witch must recruit the Wizard to help regain control of the castle.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When Wilhelmina temporarily loses her powers, she has Frank and Lyman go undercover to try and get Dorothys ruby slippers, but the monkeys find out that its easy to get in too deep.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.desc: Hes got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Beans heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off so he builds a wind turbine - all fine until theres too much wind! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean is tired of litterbugs and attempts to clean up the whole town himself…with disastrous results. / Mr Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn pest refuses to leave. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mr Bean enters a competition to win a trolley of free food! / Mr Bean meets a soul mate. / Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again. Grizzy steps in and propels the creature to the back of a mysterious ice cave. In the center is a dolmen with a bone sitting on it. Whoever touches the bone becomes docile and prehistoric in appearance. The Lemmings dream up a scheme where Grizzy would submit to their will.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Robins ride Redbird is on the case in this radical music video, as he sneaks and sleuths his way to stop Gothams villains with his speed and detective skills - its no mystery why Redbird is one of the best!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order but Jerrys got other ideas.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom makes a deal with a magician, they go to town as they perform a show.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magicians plans. / Tom forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue. / The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster. / Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs. / Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog. / Fed up Tom decides to go home to his birth family. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whos laid back attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Spike gets a cold and hes separated from his son, Tyke. Spike tells Tom to take care of him, or else.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. / While salmon fishing on the riverbank Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. / With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers. / The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing all of Batmans heroic vehicle squad - the Batwheels - showcasing their incredible gadgets, stunning talents, and unique personalities.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Bibi wishes that she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, she decides to only focus on having fun instead.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Buff takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give him the nickname Tough Buff.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song and need to learn to harmonise to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When it starts to rain outside, Porky hopes to show The Looney Builders that they can still have fun inside by building a fort.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a castle for Elmer the Giant. They admire his toys and use them without his permission.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss peab korraldama nii, et Rannutigu Toiduteokotta ara armuks. Kuidas see tal õnnestub?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana toovad Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad koju konna. Mis nao teevad selle peale teised linnaelanikud?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana on Kubaralinnas metsa-vembupaev. Kas Mikk-Mikul ja sõpradel õnnestub keegi haneks tõmmata või lahevad nad hoopis ise õnge?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad on sunnitud Torikut ning Tatikut võõrustama.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt! Dragged out of his slumber and swept away upon a vehicle, Grizzy finishes the race in a daze. Not far away, the Lemmings find a mask that can control dreams. Once Grizzy gathers his wits, he wants only to get hold of the object and return to the she-bear of his dreams. But the Lemmings have other dreams, like high-powered racing cars.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun! When a cloud passes overhead, Grizzy realizes that their respective gadgets run on electricity provided by solar panels. No more sun, no more electricity! He devises a plan whereby he will be the only one to access the energy, but the Lemmings have not said their last word!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk. Indeed, when placed inside, the trunk can blend two objects into one! The Lemmings are quicker and get their hands on the trunk, then set out to play with objects they have enhanced. But its Grizzy who discovers the formula that makes you ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table. All except one, who bounces off some jelly pudding which was left behind. When the Lemmings discover its highly spongy texture, they invent a whole bunch of new bouncing games. But Grizzy, starving and dinner-deprived, has his eyes on the dessert!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. The rodents land upon an ancient Celtic site where they happen upon a magic bracelet that increases the strength of whoever wears it tenfold. The Lemmings start the competition over with their new power, only this time using menhirs! A witness to the scene, Grizzy longs for the magic object and imagines everything he could do with the piece of jewelry.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, he glimpses a human form by the light of a lightning bolt. Terrified, Grizzy unwittingly sets off a mechanism which had been activated by the lightning, and which brings to life a medieval armor. The living armor bows before the flabbergasted bear. Grizzy has just found a docile and fearsome ally with whom to combat the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. / Whilst out snapping nature with his camera Mr Bean gets angry when nature snaps back. / Bean discovers that in the world of organised crime a teddy isnt always a teddy. Sometimes its a rabbit. / Mr Bean cant find a parking space so he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration - and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Seenemikud puuavad valja selgitada, miks nende linn aina kahaneb ja kahaneb.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit teeb katset Mudanupuga sõprust sobitada, aga kas mudakollist uldse on mingit sõpra?

programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?! Then when some Mushlets become adrift on the river, Team Mush-Mush, with Morels help, have to save the day again.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit kardab, et on oma ande ara rikkunud, ja loodab Tahekubaralt abi saada.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.desc: A series of spooky sounds and sights leads the Batwheels to believe that the Batcave is haunted by a B-B-Bat-Ghost!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Wizard invents a magical device called the Predictalizer that can predict with one hundred percent accuracy the day of every single citizen of Oz, Dorothy thinks things have become a little too predictable. Lion is fully onboard with lifes scary uncertainties being gone until Wilhelmina is able to steal the device and use it for her own ends. The only way to stop her is by being so unpredictable even the Predictalizer cant predict it.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After the Wicked Witch tricks the Wizard into sharing his powers for an Oztember celebration, Dorothy and her friends must stop her from making the change permanent.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When legendary knight Sir Hokus arrives in Oz, Dorothy tries to help him find an adventure. However, Sir Hokus is a bit "past his prime," and Dorothy quickly finds herself trying to save both Oz and Sir Hokus from a rampaging army of angry statues.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: What? No Christmas in Oz? Dorothy introduces Oz to Christmas and of course Oz adds a few traditions of its own. Santa comes to deliver holiday cheer and presents to all. Too bad the witches have a different plan for Santa!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch has kidnapped Santa in an attempt to steal his magic. Can Dorothy and her friends save Santa in time for him to save Christmas in Oz?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself - a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers - one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt! Dragged out of his slumber and swept away upon a vehicle, Grizzy finishes the race in a daze. Not far away, the Lemmings find a mask that can control dreams. Once Grizzy gathers his wits, he wants only to get hold of the object and return to the she-bear of his dreams. But the Lemmings have other dreams, like high-powered racing cars.

programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.
