programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Bigyuki - Bird
programme.desc: BIGYUKIs is New York Citys secret musical weapon! His unprecedented sound has attracted the attention of many, including Grammy Award-winning and nominated artists such as Q-Tip, Bilal, Talib Kweli, Harvey Mason, Marcus Strickland, Mark Giuliana, and Meshell Ndegeocello. BIGYUKIs music offers a soulful exploration into the wondrous soundscapes of his infinitely virtuosic mind. Infusing elements of jazz, classical music, hip-hop, soul, rock, dance, and electronica, BIGYUKI reaches a new and inspiring level, with support from guitarist Randy Runyon and drummer Smithsoneon. It is hard to believe that just three musicians can create a sound this massive.

programme.title: Portrait of Roy Ayers
programme.desc: "The legend of the groove" is a series of documentaries devoted to the musicians who were most influential on contemporary hip hop, soul, rhythm n blues, and on the course of history. Between the late 1950s and now, these musicians radically changed music. Although sometimes hardly in the public eye, they have all been major sources of inspiration for todays major artists: Prince, Erykah Badu, Janis Joplin and Jimi Hendrix.

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: MotorMusic Jazz Session
programme.sub-title: MotorMusic Jazz Session: From Rossini to Piazzolla
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. This episode is all about the Habanera Duo, which sprung from a meeting of minds between flutist Marc Grauwels and accordion player Christophe Delporte, around their shared passion for the Argentine tango and the music of Ástor Piazzolla. After hearing how well their instruments blended, these two musicians founded the Habanera Duo. The duo offers the audience an eclectic repertoire that is simultaneously refined and audacious. Expect a beautiful hodgepodge of classical music and jazz, inspired by composers ranging from Piazzolla to Gioacchino Rossini.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. The Dave Brubeck Quartet gave an unforgettable performance at the North Sea Jazz Festival of 1982. The open-eared American pianist was one of the first to weave elements from both classical and African music into his improvisations and compositions. Known the world over for the million-selling 1961 crossover hit Take Five, the earlier, third stream-like output of his late 1940s Octet shows the origins of this ever-adventurous artist. Original Dave Brubeck Octet clarinettist Bill Smith (1926-2020) joined Brubeck for his 1982 North Sea Jazz Festival concert.

programme.title: Brazilian NYE
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this series is Paulo Novaes. Coming from a family of musicians, Paulo Novaes has already lived through a lifetime of music in spite of his young age. Paulo is the cousin of singer Bruna Caram, with whom he performed in Sao Paulo, Madrid, Barcelona, Lisbon, and other major cities. As a singer, composer, and instrumentalist, his creativity is enjoyed in many forms. With three albums out and his song "Perdoa" reaching over 20 million streams on Spotify, he steps into the spotlights time and time again. Now Da Pá Virada Sessions and Stingray present Paulo Novaes in this intimate performance, recorded in Novaes native city Sao Paulo.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: Legendary African-American folk singer Odetta (1930-2008) sang her spirituals with immeasurable sorrow and anguish. Her spiritual music expresses the horrific impact of slavery on millions of African people stolen from their homeland. For Odetta, folk music—be it spirituals, blues or field songs—was a vehicle for expressing the racism and injustice experienced by black people dating back to the days of slavery. This 1964 episode of Face au Public shows the melancholy of the era.

programme.title: Terrasson and Belmondo
programme.sub-title: Terrasson and Belmondo: À Nous Garo
programme.desc: Every year, the Jazz en Baie festival takes place in the beautiful bay of Mont Saint-Michel Todays broadcast shows a special gathering between two grandmasters of French jazz: pianist Jacky Terrasson and trumpeter Stephane Belmondo. The two team up for an amazing concert in which jazz is combined with soul and a touch of chanson française. The Franco-American pianist Terrasson delights in travelling the world, collaboration with others and leading his own trio, quartet, or quintet. With his long-time friend, Stephane Belmondo, Terrasson has produced wonderful CDs and beautiful concerts. One then finds the trumpeter on the pianists album Gouache; on another, the pianist guests on Belmondos Ever After. At the Jazz en Baie festival, the duo plays its amazing piano and trumpet music. Highly recommended!

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the multi-ethnic ensemble Hijaz. This band explores the dialogue between piano and the oud, a pear-shaped stringed instrument from the East. Hijaz is a close-knit quartet that explores the differences and similarities between Mediterranean cultures in order to create moments of harmony, warmth, and great musical beauty.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Mont Saint-Michel
programme.sub-title: Mont Saint-Michel: Steve Grossman and Peter King
programme.desc: Every year, the Jazz en Baie festival takes place in the beautiful bay of Mont Saint-Michel. Todays broadcast shows a special gathering between saxophone heavyweights Peter King and Steve Grossman. These experienced musicians trip to the bay amounts to much more than a social call. The quintet, which is rounded out by bass player Duylinh NGuyen, drummer Stephane Huchard and pianist Alain Jean-Marie, delivers an amazing show. Although the two saxophonists have an average age of 70, these jazz titans will convince you youre watching young musicians on stage - albeit with 70 years of experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the trio Massot/Florizoone/Horbaczewski. This adventurous threesome pushes the boundaries of jazz, folk and classical music. There is a certain commonality between the instruments they play: accordion, tuba and cello share a richness of sound, as well as a broad register and a photogenic appearance. When improvising, the trio produces the weirdest and wackiest, but also most moving sounds.

programme.title: Selah Sue @ Festival Culturebox
programme.desc: Belgian singer-songwriter Selah Sue performed at La Cigale in Paris as part of the digital Culturebox Festival 2020. The singer released her million-selling debut album "Selah Sue" in March 2011, featuring her popular single "Raggamuffin" and her duet "Please" with American hip-hop artist Cee Lo Green. Months after its release, Selah was presented with a European Border Breakers Award (EBBA), for her cross-border success. At La Cigale in 2020, Selah Sue is accompanied by Joachim Saerens on keyboard and Simon Lenski on cello, opening her concert with a jazzed-up So This Is Love, a romantic ballad from Walt Disneys film Cinderella.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Milt Jacksons Modern Jazz Quartet at the Bozar
programme.desc: The Modern Jazz Quartet (MJQ) was composed of Milt "Bags" Jackson on vibraphone, John Lewis on piano, Percy Heath on bass, and Connie Kay on drums. Milt Jackson and John Lewis were pioneer bebop musicians who had played together in Dizzy Gillespies 1948 big band. They pursued separate careers before adding Heath and Lewis to form the Modern Jazz Quartet in the 1950s. Noted for its delicate percussion sonorities, innovative jazz forms, and high performance standards, the MJQ was an immensely popular jazz and "third stream" ensemble until its final concerts in the early 1990s.

programme.title: Van Merwijks Music Machine with Theodossi Spassov
programme.desc: Drummer, percussionist, and bandleader Lucas van Merwijk guarantees ardent, exotic swing. He has been at the forefront of the European jazz, latin and percussion scene for more than 25 years and has been playing cuban music for many years mainly in large ensembles such as his 20 piece Cubop City Big Band and Nueva Manteca. Van Merwijk also was elected "Best Jazz Drummer" in the Benelux countries by the readers of De Slagwerkkrant many times running between the years 1993 and 2013 and has won the prestigious Global Act Award 2010 for his work in the World Music field. For this performance of Van Merwijks Music Machine he invited the absolute master of the kaval (shepherds flute) Theodosii Spassov, the internationally much sought after percussionist Martin Verdonk (whose collaborations include work with Richard Bona, Prince, Steve Winwood), pianist Stormvogel and bassist Reno Steba. All in all, a fantastic colloboration which is unprecedented!

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.sub-title: Paradox Live: Jeroen van Vliet Moon Trio
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In the TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch pianist Jeroen van Vliet.

programme.title: 29th Street Saxophone Quartet
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The 29th Street Saxophone Quartet is an American quartet founded in 1982 by alto saxophonists Bobby Watson and Ed Jackson, tenor saxophonist Rich Rothenberg and baritone saxophonist Jim Hartog. The band has an eclectic repertoire ranging from jazz to show, funk, rap, and experimental music.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. La Waltz 2, 3 and More is an episode of TorTube that pulls you into the world of De Tor. Veteran vocalist Humphrey Campbell shares the stage with chromatic harmonica player Hermine Deurloo for a unique mix of spectacular music.

programme.title: Moonchild - Moods
programme.desc: The American jazz trio Moonchild consists of multi-instrumentalists Amber Navran (vocals, saxophone, clarinet), Max Bryk (saxophone, flute, clarinet, keyboard), and Andris Mattson (trumpet, flugelhorn, keyboard). The three musicians met during their study at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles. A year after their formation in 2011, they released their first album "Be Free" (2012). Their music has been described as neo-soul, alternative RandB, and jazz. This trio-on-the-rise has toured with several renowned artists, including Kamasi Washington and The Internet. In this 2017 concert from Jazz Club Moods in Zurich, Switzerland, Moonlight teams up with drummer Efajemue Etoroma.

programme.title: Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: VEIN Plays Ravel
programme.desc: A sound support with provocative combinations, a modern music laboratory, a vehicle of inspiration whose importance has been proven by many high-profile collaborations. Music lovers who appreciate jazz for its ability to provoke and continuously question the status quo certainly do not expect that such a standard set in its configuration finds itself completely detached from tradition. But sometimes, the more the DNA of a set is anchored in tradition, the higher the margin to give way to novelty. Innovation is at the heart of the approach of VEIN, a bold Swiss ensemble composed of brothers Michael and Florian Arbenz, and bassist Thomas Lahns, for whom the term "piano trio" has long been too restrictive.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "Viva" is a perfect mixture of various instruments and musicians from all over the world. Vocalists Aynur and Dima Oshno perform with the All Star Band. Aynur sings about the life and sufferings of Kurdish people, in particular Kurdish women. Musically, she tries to blend Kurdish and Western music, creating her own style and interpreting the traditional repertoire in a modern and fresh way.

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Earl Hines Quartet in Spa, 1977
programme.desc: Despite his advanced age, the legendary jazz pianist Earl Hines was at the top of his game when he performed in the Belgian town of Spa in 1977. With a band consisting of Rudy Rutherford (reeds), Jimmy Leary (bass), and Eddie Graham (drums), Hines livens up the room with his interpretations of "I Cant Believe That Youre In Love With Me" and "The Man I Love." Marva Josie joins the group for soulful renditions of "A Sunday Kind of Love" and the well-known classic "Kansas City" before the set comes to a close with "Caravan," which features a lengthy drum solo by Graham.

programme.title: Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1989, American pianist Armando Anthony "Chick" Corea was one of the artists appearing here. In this concert Corea returned to his roots, performing jazz standards and originals in a stripped-down trio setting of piano, bass and drums. With Dave Weckl (drums) and John Patitucci (bass), this highly interactive trio actually had its beginnings in 1985 with Chick Coreas Elektric Band.

programme.title: The Crusaders
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Crusaders, an American jazz fusion group that was popular in the 70s employed a two-manned front-line horn section. The groups sound was rooted in hard bop, with an emphasis on RandB and soul. Their performance at Estival is beyond soulful and an amazing show to watch.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64
programme.sub-title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64: The Divine One
programme.desc: Sarah Vaughan: Live in 58 and 64 features the "Divine One" in her prime, wrapping her sultry voice around jazz standards such as Lover Man, "Misty" and "I Got Rhythm" and soaring on popular showtunes such as "Over The Rainbow" and Maria. One of the greatest voices of the 20th Century, her renditions of songs by Harold Arlen, Leonard Bernstein, Johnny Burke, the Gershwins and Stephen Sondheim are pure diva magic. These three performances demonstrate why Sarah Vaughan is invariably mentioned in the same breath as Ella Fitzgerald and Billie Holiday.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, smooth jazz saxophonist and crowd-favorite Kenny G serenaded those attending the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. After beginning his career in the Love Unlimited Orchestra, he now brings his own band for this hypnotic performance.

programme.title: Rebirth
programme.desc: Amsterdam, February 6th, 2018 - The short documentary Rebirth in The Amsterdam Red Light District illustrates how brutal Richard Lems life as an addict was and his struggle to unshackle himself from the shame. Filled with fierce, freighting, and sad moments, Richard relives his stabbing, stay in jail, drug test, and drug use. Richard expresses himself verbally but mainly relives the moments through drumming, which renders the documentary an intense and unique experience. Addiction doctor and musician Gerard Alderliefste: "If he dares to bottom out, he will see it was the drugs and not himself. Music can bring those emotions to the surface".

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jazzwoche Burghausen
programme.desc: Every year since 1970, the German city of Burghausen has been hosting one of the largest jazz festivals in the world. During Burghausen International Jazz Week, Burghausen becomes a Bavarian jazz mecca: guests from all over the world join the Burghausers to enjoy the most wonderful jazz performances as the colorful hustle and bustle of spectators and musicians shake up the city. One of the bands performing here in 2019 is the Walter Trout Band. Trout, who was born in New Jersey and is based in Los Angeles, is a world-famous contemporary blues rock guitarist and vocalist.

programme.title: Salif Keita and Les Ambassadeurs
programme.desc: Salif Keitas music is a rich combination of traditional Malian music with European and American influences. We can hear this in the instrumentation of Keitas music, which varies from traditional West-African instruments to Western European ones. The Malian singer was cast out by his family because of his albinism. In 1967 he moved to Bamako, where he started his musical career and joined Les Ambassadeurs (Internationaux). He achieved international acknowledgement with this band in the 1970s. After spending a couple of years in Ivory Coast, Salif has found his home base in Paris since 1984. During this 2010 concert, he proves to be rightfully referred to as "The Golden Voice of Africa".

programme.title: Ryan Porter and The West Coast Get Down - BIRD
programme.desc: Los Angeles-born saxophonist Kamasi Washington and trombonist Ryan Porter co-founded West Coast Get Down - a musical collective fusing jazz and funk with hip-hop. It is partly because of this collective that jazz saw a resurgence in Los Angeles, subtly eclipsing the long-established jazz mecca of the world, New York City. The two musicians join forces and take the vibes of Los Angeles to jazz club BIRD in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Erroll Garner
programme.desc: Erroll Garner: Live in 63 and 64 presents two beautifully filmed concerts featuring his classic trio of bassist Eddie Calhoun and drummer Kelly Martin. Erroll Garner was one of jazzs true original players and this showcases his improvisational brilliance on a parade of his most classic numbers, such as "Fly Me To The Moon" and "I Get A Kick Out Of You", as well as originals "Errolls Theme," "Mambo Erroll", and his best-known composition, "Misty".

programme.title: New Cool Collective Big Band at the Oosterpoort
programme.desc: New Cool Collective have been happily grooving on 24 years of fame thanks to their unique mix of jazz, dance, latin, salsa, afrobeat and boogaloo. As pioneers in the Dutch jazz scene NCC has received many awards and the band have toured the great expanses of Europe, Asia and North America. They not only play hipster jazz clubs but also such huge pop and rock festivals as Sziget, Lowlands (Netherlands) and the Aberdeen Alternative Festival. And they collaborated with many Dutch and international artists on tour and in the studio. During this show New Cool Collective is expended to the big band formation, expect energetic, danceable and great music!

programme.title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood
programme.sub-title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: Guitarist Mike Stern and violin player Didier Lockwood sharing a stage: that promises a good show! After playing for years with Blood, Sweat and Tears, Mike Stern landed a gig with drummer Billy Cobham and then broke through with Miles Davis comeback band in the 1980s. Didier Lockwood played in jazz fusion band Magma during the 1970s and is known for his use of electric amplification and experimentation. Together they perform a unique duo concert at the beautiful antique theatre in Vienne, France.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content. Saxophonist Ben Sluijs received a classical training. He has a strong melodic and harmonic approach to music. His music offers no room for showing off: its all about the music itself. Sluijs fascination for jazz developed after his cum laude graduation, inspiring him to take lessons with the American saxophonist and flutist David Liebman in the USA.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kenny Barron, Song for Abdullah
programme.desc: Pianist Kenny Barrons June 27, 2019 appearance at the Alfa Jazz Festival in Ukraines Lviv was a celebration of sublime jazz virtuosity. The revered elder statesmen of jazz piano brought his regular working trio of Kiyoshi Kitagawa (bass) and Jonathan Blake (drums), augmented by stellar jazzman Marcus Strickland (tenor saxophone) and young lion Riley Mulherkar (trumpet). Their seamless blend of classic bebop and modern explorations spoke of a deep, emotive connection to each note, captivating the Ukrainian audience with lyrical improvisations during this unforgettable concert.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: I Will Not Be Sad
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival, held in Osnabrueck, has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Jivan Gasparyan Jr has always been inspired by the folk melodies of his native Armenia. His grandfather, also a musician, taught him the art of duduk, an instrument of Armenian origin.

programme.title: Song for my father
programme.desc: Legendary jazz pianist Horace Silvers groundbreaking fusion of hard bop, blues, soulful grooves and Cape Verdean influences have left an indelible mark on the world of jazz. At the renowned Umbria Jazz Festival in the picturesque region of Umbria, Italy, Silver is accompanied by a great band of future all-stars: Bob Berg on tenor sax, Tom Harrell on trumpet, Steve Beskrone on bass and Eddie Gladden on drums. During this performance from July 20, 1976, Silvers quintet stretches out on four Silver originals: "Adjustment", "Barbara", "In Pursuit of the 27th Man", and "Song For My Father". Tune in and let Horace Silvers irresistible music mesmerize you!

programme.title: Gunsmoke Blues
programme.desc: In 1971, the camera crew of the Western series Gunsmoke travelled from Hollywood to the Pacific Northwest to capture blues greats Muddy Waters, Big Joe Turner, Big Mama Thornton and George "Harmonica" Smith during their tour. This documentary shows some of their best performances at the University of Oregon followed by footage and interviews on the road.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is Os Capoeira. This ensemble practices the traditional Brazilian martial art from Bahia it is named after, combining elements of dance, acrobatics, and percussive music. Moreover, Os Capoeira runs a cultural center in Sao Paulo. Let yourself be inspired by Os Capoeiras unique take on Brazilian culture!

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ.tv asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Baden Powell Quartet - Jazz Samba
programme.desc: Recorded in 1971 in Paris, France, Brazilian, classically trained bossa nova guitarist Baden Powell and his quartet play Pai, Lotus (written by Baden Powell), Tristeza (by Haroldo Lobo/Niltinho), Round Midnight (by Thelonious Monk), Nega do cabelo duro (by David Nasser/Rubens Soares), and Aos pes da cruz (by Ze da Zilda/Marino Pinto). Powell is joined by Ernesto Ribeiro-Gonçalves on double bass, Helio Schiavo on drums, and Alfredo Bessa on percussion.

programme.title: Autumn Leaves/Whats new/Moonlight in Vermont
programme.desc: Explore the music of one of the most influential and innovative saxophonists in jazz history: John Coltrane! Immerse yourself in this collection of remarkable performances from the early 1960s that showcase Coltranes unparalleled artistry and unique sound during a transformative period in the artists career. Recorded in various European cities, Coltrane is seen playing the songs "Autumn Leaves", "Hackensack", "My Favorite Things", "I Want To Talk About You", "Vigil", and "Naima". Tune in and experience why the music of John Coltrane has touched the lives of so many!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Ladama, is a quintet of women multi-instrumentalists from Venezuela, Brazil, Colombia and the United States who not only perform as a touring band, but also strive to engage youth in their respective communities in the process of musicmaking, composition and audio production through collaboration and performance workshops. Ladama is a positive force in times urgently in need of tolerance and communication.

programme.title: Sazz Leonore sings Michael Buble
programme.desc: With her relaxed, smooth voice, vocalist Sazz Leonore has made her name on the Dutch jazz scene. The vocalist grew up in a family of jazz fans: from a very early age, she developed a fondness for the music of Ella Fitzgerald, Billie Holiday, and others. Sazz Leonore knows how to transport her audience to the music of the 1960s, while putting her own, contemporary stamp on her music. In this concert, which was recorded at Amsterdams North Sea Jazz Club, the vocalist salutes one of her idols: the Canadian vocalist Michael Buble. The combination of Sazzs smooth voice, her solid band, and the timeless repertoire of her famous Canadian idol guarantee a wonderful evening!

programme.title: Django Reinhardt Tribute
programme.sub-title: Django Reinhardt Tribute: Beets and Rosenberg
programme.desc: The treasured compositions of guitarist Django Reinhardt, the founding father of hot club jazz, are engraved in everyones memory. Although Reinhardt missed two fingers of his left hand, his virtuoso technique was unrivalled. Dutch guitarist Stochelo Rosenberg and pianist Peter Beets now have the pleasure to bring Djangos music back to life with their infectious improvisations.

programme.title: PC Qwintett
programme.desc: Pierre Courbois has been one of Europes leading jazz musicians since the mid-sixties. This concert, recorded at the renowned Amsterdam jazz club Bimhuis, sees the drummer playing with his QWINTETT. On the occasion of his 75th birthday in 2015, Courbois hit the road for the Pierre Courbois 75 Years Anniversary Tour. The PC QWINTETT consists of several highly acclaimed Dutch jazz musicians with whom Courbois has worked before in his long and versatile career. Among them are pianist Nike Langenhuijsen, double bassist Egon Kracht, trumpeter Toon de Gouw, and trombonist Ilja Reijngoud. QWINTETT honours the Charles Mingus tradition of thematic and melodic ensemble jazz - but also with an unmistakable Courbois groove! Courbois, known for his own way of combining compositions with improvisations, melodically melts constructions with uneven breaks.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: Identities. the Recording
programme.desc: "Identities: The Recording" is a concert film about the recording of composer, arranger, saxophonist and band leader Kārlis Vanagss album "Identities" with the Latvian Radio Big Band. The film shows all the album tracks as well as behind-the-scenes footage. "Identities", which was recorded directly to analog tape without editing or overdubbing, won the Latvian Music Award for Best Latvian Jazz Album in 2020. The Latvian Radio Big Band is one of the Baltics most legendary jazz ensembles. It has proven itself on countless high quality recordings over the years, and has brought together outstanding jazz musicians. "Identities" is made up of surprisingly honest and personal Kārlis Vanags compositions that are rooted in the big band tradition. This recording of lively, contemporary swing music is as popularly accessible as it is artistically rewarding.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "World Music", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Teofilo Chantre, Tiwitine, Kinsy Ray, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "The Art of Duo" presents an unprecedented duo featuring pianist Salman Gambarov and sheng player, a Chinese mouth-organ, Wu Wei.

programme.desc: Sarah ja Holder viivad uurimist labi koolis. Richmond puuab kontrollida poliitilisi tagajargi.

programme.desc: Kui Steve McGarrett naaseb koju Oahusse, et leida oma isa tapja, pakub kuberner talle võimalust juhtida oma tooruhma: 5-0.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adrian Monk on uks San Francisco politseijaoskonna parimaid tootajaid, kuid parast abikaasa traagilist surma on kõik muutunud: andekast detektiivist sai uleoo ettearvamatu ja impulsiivne inimene, kellel on ebanormaalsed hirmud ja kes arritub vaga kergesti. Sellest hoolimata puuab Monk oma tood edasi teha, kuid sellel on ettearvamatud tagajarjed.

programme.title: Kurjuse kannul

programme.title: Tapmine
programme.desc: El Diablo.Richmond kahtlustab, et keegi tema tiimist on infot lekitanud. Sarah ja Holder otsivad ules võimaliku mõrvatunnistaja ning nad juhitakse uue kahtlusaluse jalile. Mitch sulgub endasse ning Stan peab parast Rosie kaotamist ise peret koos hoidma.

programme.title: Monk

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Omanaoline kohtingusaade, kus valik tehakse aeglaselt paljastuvate alasti kehade põhjal.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Armastusesaar hõlmab gruppi võitslejaid, keda nimetatakse saarlasteks. Nad elavad valismaailmast eraldatuna Mallorca villas ja on pideva videovalve all. Villas ellujaamiseks peavad saarlased olema paaris mõne teise saarlasega ning sooritama erinevaid valjakutseid. Võitnud paar saab endale 56 000 eurot.

programme.title: Saatmata kirjade lood
programme.desc: Oliver ja Shane uurivad oma sõprust õhtusoogiklubis, kus nad kohtuvad naisega, kes on akilise lahkumineku parast oma poiss-sõbraga šokis ja palub neil ules leida vaartuslik kiri, mille ta just mehele saatis.

programme.title: Rannamaja remondihundid
programme.desc: Äge suhtesari "Rannamaja" pakub vaatajatele kuhjaga romantilisi suhteid ning pooraseid seiklusi! Kuus noort ja vallalist kolivad elama rannamajja uhe eesmargiga – luua romantilisi suhteid ja leida omale kaaslane. Kui kokkukolinute hulgas sobivat paarilist ei ole, siis korraldatakse pidusid eesmargiga leida kaaslane pidutsedes. Juba esimeses episoodis selgub, et osalistevahelised tunded võivad tekkida vaga kiiresti ning sama kiirelt võib kogu olukord võtta ka dramaatilise poorde.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuseks naitame eelmise hooaja viimast episoodi. Sirje tunnistab Albertile tõtt. Kertu lukkab Eriku ettepaneku tagasi. Valter puuab Siirit lohutada. Indrek kutsub Mari ullatuseks Kadri neile kulla. Mammu teeb stseeni. Gunnar lahkub salaja haiglast. Sirje saab ootamatu kirja...

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Uus Hispaania sari, mis jalgib Vanasilla kula elanike elu 20. sajandi alguses. Tegevuse keskmes on rikas Montenegrode perekond, mille perepea Francisca on kõigeks võimeline, et oma võimu sailitada. Carlos Castro võrgutab noore ammaemanda Pepa, kes jaab rasedaks. Elvira kasib Pepalt lapse ara võtta. 6 aastat hiljem naaseb Pepa kulla ja tutvub noore ja nagusa sõduri Tristaniga.

programme.title: Esmakohtingute hotell
programme.desc: Sarmikas ulemkelner Fred Sirieix kutsub vallalisi romantilisse luksuslikku hotelli Lõuna-Prantsusmaal. Romantikuid, kes otsivad seda õiget, ootab ees idulliline keskkond ja parim kosjasobitamisteenus. Esimesena tuleb hotelli modell Kelly, kes otsib sportlikku meest. Bruce, 57aastane koristaja, tahab uhe õnneliku naise jalust rabada. Joey, 26aastane eratreener, on andnud Fredile ulesanne leida talle esimene peigmees.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Kas Dana paaseb Bronte kaest vigastusteta? Irene on muserdatud. Kirby mangib Amorit.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.sub-title: Kupsetatud oad, haisev juust, Skinny šampanja
programme.desc: Purustame toiduainete kohta keerlevaid muute ja laseme teaduslikel argumentidel kõnelda.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Purustame toiduainete kohta keerlevaid muute ja laseme teaduslikel argumentidel kõnelda.

programme.title: Immenhof - suve suurim seiklus
programme.desc: Suvi on viimaks siin ja Immenhofi õed ei jõua ara oodata, et nad saaks puhata ja oma hobustega aega veeta. On ainult uks aga - nimelt on Immenhof pankrotis ja nende agressiivne naaber hairib neid. Lou naeb olukorrast ainult uht valjapaasu ja ka see nõuab temalt suurt riski.

programme.title: Liblikad kõhus
programme.desc: Romantiline film Emilyst, kes peab liblikaari ning monarhliblikaid sunnipaevapeole toimetades kohtub seal uksikisa Garrettiga. Garretti ja tema tutre abiga saab Emily ari suisa tiivad.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: Elina elab oma elu kabuhirmus! Nimelt on ta viimase viie aastaga kaotanud kõik oma lahedased - ema, isa, vanaema ja venna - asjaoludel, milles kõigil juhtumitel on tahtsat osa nende inimeste surmas manginud just alkohol. Arusaadavalt ei julge Elina ise enam alkoholi puutudagi ja lein ning trauma on temas kujunenud peaaegu neuroosiks…

programme.title: Esmakohtingud
programme.desc: Humoorikas romantika-tõsielusari paaride esmakohtingutest õdusas restoranis. Ärevus, põnevus ja lootus igavesele armastusele kaivad siin kasikaes, sest pimekohtingule saabuv naine ega mees ei tea, kes teda seal ees ootab. Suhteid aitab sattida restorani varvikas personal ettekandjatest kuni baarmenini valja.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Fenomenaalselt edukas ja pikaealine Austraalia draamasari ookeani-aarse vaikelinna Summer Bay elanike rõõmudest ja muredest, armumistest ja sudamete purunemistest. Sarja trumbiks on haaravad ja inimlikult usutavad tegelaskujud, kelle eludega on vaatajal kerge samastuda. Tegelaste galerii on ka piisavalt mitmekesine, et igauks leiaks endale lemmiku, kellele kaasa elada - siin on nii teismelisi, noori taiskasvanuid kui ka juba kupsesse keskikka jõudnud peategelasi. Lisaboonuseks on Summer Bay igikestev paikesepaiste, mis rõhutab sarja positiivsust ja elurõõmu.

programme.title: Ühte sulanud sudamed
programme.desc: Raskustes raamatupoe pidaja Mary ja tuntud pahapoisist hokimangija Adam pannakse koos tootama, et nad kumbki teise poole kuvandit parandaksid. Peagi avastavad nad ka ise, et vastandid tõepoolest tõmbuvad.

programme.title: Minu emps on kõvem kokk kui sinu ema
programme.desc: Kaasahaaravas telesõus astuvad vastamisi kaks paari, kus vanemad juhendavad ja lapsed kokkavad. Parem paar paaseb jargmisesse saatesse. Tanases saates asuvad võistlustulle Hunt Kriimsilm ehk õpetaja-, õhtujuhi- ja pulmavanema ametit pidav Ivi koos kudumidisainerist tutre Siretiga ning toidukoolitaja ja grillmeister Tarmo koos tehnikahuvilise poja Markusega.

programme.title: Õhtusook kahele
programme.desc: Tanases saates antakse Jonile Liverpoolist viis menuud, millest igauhe on koostanud uks potentsiaalne pimekohtingu kandidaat. Iga menuu autor on pannud kokku kolmekaigulise õhtusoogi, kuid Jon õhtustab neist ainult kolmega, tehes oma valikud menuude põhjal. Aga kui õhtusoogid soodud ja kohtingud labi, siis kellega ta edasisi plaane teha tahaks?

Sheila, 81aastane pensionil refleksoloog, kes usub kindlalt, et elu algab alles 80aastaselt. Reklaamidirektor Tom, 27aastane, on energiline mees. Tema kaaslane on nimekaim ja moejuht Tom.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: 16-aastased keskkoolitudrukud Karoliina ja Siiri tutvuvad pidutsemise kaigus 46-aastase Veikoga, kes on tudrukutega sõbrustamisest niivõrd huvitatud, et ei kõhkle neile valja ja kalleid kingitusi tegemast. Tagasihoidlikest oludest parit tudrukud on Veiko pakutavatest materiaalsetest huvedest vaimustatud ja kasutavad meest lupsilehmana, kordagi mõtlemata, mis mehe lahkuse taga võib olla.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Peatage see pulm!
programme.desc: Romantikafilm! Annabelle on oma tadiga vaga lahedane ja sestap on tema ullatus ja mure suur, kui tadi peale põgusat suhtlust kergemeelsena naiva naabrimehega pulmi asub plaaneerima. Sama murelik on ka naabrimehe poeg Clay, kes peale ema surma naitlejast isa pidevate uute suhete ja lahutustega on pidanud silmitsi seisma. Clay ja Annabelle jatavad oma tood ja tegemised sinnapaika ning tormavad kohale mõtlematuna naivaid pulmi peatama! Loomulikult viib uks segadus teiseni ja peagi on tekkimas hoopis uus paarike!

Kuus noort ja vallalist kolivad elama rannamajja uhe eesmargiga – luua romantilisi suhteid ja leida omale kaaslane. Kui kokkukolinute hulgas sobivat paarilist ei ole, siis korraldatakse pidusid eesmargiga leida kaaslane pidutsedes. Juba esimeses episoodis selgub, et osalistevahelised tunded võivad tekkida vaga kiiresti ning sama kiirelt võib kogu olukord võtta ka dramaatilise poorde.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Kertu on Erikuga toimunud muutustest segaduses. Kadri kaitumine tekitab pingeid Mari ja Indreku vahel. Eva puuab Sirje kaudu Urmast ules leida. Siiri aga massib end jarjest suuremate valede võrku, kuniks Kertu otsustab sekkuda.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: Kassahitist seiklusmarul salaagendist, keda huutakse XXX. Endine kurikael ja adrenaliini-sõltlane XXX varvatakse sunniviisiliselt agendiks ja saadetakse uliohtlikule missioonile. Ta peab imbuma vene maffiasse, kus vahelejaamise korral ootab teda eriti jõhker ja piinarikas surm. Samal ajal ei tohi ta ka politseile vahele jaada, sest ametlikult ei seo teda tema tooandjaga mitte miski...

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Lõuna-Ameerikas
programme.desc: Teet ronib oma rasket Inca Traili ja jõuab raske pingutuse tulemusena lõpuks peidetud Incade linna - Machu Picchusse. Mõlemad mehed imetlevad kaunist Titicaca jarve, Teet Peruu ja Kristjan Boliivia poolt. Kristjan kulastab Kuu ja Paikese saart ja ka kõrkjasaari ehk Urose ujuvsaari.

programme.title: Vaikesed asjad
programme.desc: Psuhholoogilises krimipõnevikus saadetakse Kerni maakonna abišerif Joe "Deke" Deacon Los Angelesse lihtsat ulesannet taitma - asitõendeid koguma. Kuid ta kaasatakse seal linna terroriseeriva mõrvari otsingutesse. Jahti korraldavale LA šerifijaoskonna seersandile Jim Baxterile avaldab Dekei võmmivaist muljet ja ta võtab ta mitteametlikult appi. Kuid mõrvarit jahtides ei tea Baxter, et uurimine toob pinnale mõndagi Dekei minevikust ja paljastab sungeid saladusi, mis võivad enamatki kui vaid ta juhtumi ohtu seada.

programme.title: Ohtlikuimad hetked
programme.desc: Uurime, kuidas paraplaaner raisakotka runnaku ule elab; naeme, mis juhtub, kui lammutustood lahevad totaalselt valesti; oleme tunnistajaks ema halvimale õudusunenaole; avastame, mis juhtub siis, kui kohtume elu eest võitleva lõksu sattunud metsloomaga; uurime, kuidas enam kui kuuesaja meetri kõrgusel ilma mootorita hakkama saada ja naeme, kuidas suvamere sukeldumine võib eluohtlikuks muutuda.

programme.title: Punane sekund
programme.desc: Lõviosa informatsioonist saab autojuht nagemismeele kaudu, kuid pimeda ajal on meie ees olev infovali ahtake. Millist rolli mangivad liiklusohutuses autotuled ja jalakaija nahtavus? Saatesarjas "Punane sekund" kasitletakse traagilisi juhtumeid, mis tuletavad meelde pimeda aja ohtusid.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Rooli võim
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim liiklussaade, mille teemade ring ulatub automarkidest kindlustuseni. Saade paneb proovile ka tuntud inimeste sõiduoskused ning nad paljastavad, mis neid siinses liikluses hairib ning mida tuleks liikluses umber korraldada. Muu hulgas osalevad saate tegijad ka liiklusreididel. Rooli Võim ei ole mõeldud uksnes tanastele autoomanikele ja juhtidele, vaid kõigile, kel tuleb rohkemal või vahemal maaral liiklusega kokku puutuda, ehk siis ka jalakaijatele ja uhistranspordiga liiklejatele.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: West Midlandsi politsei viib 30-aastase David Biddell Portmani kodus labi rutiinse kontrolli, kus nad avastavad olulisel maaral relvi ja 3D-printimisseadmeid.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: 400 dollarist tingitud vimm perekonnas paadib Ohio vaikelinnas topeltmõrvaga.

programme.title: Tere tulemast mõrvalinna
programme.desc: Patricia Mills hukkus Texases Goliadis majapõlengus. Tema õde, kes kahtlustab, et tulekahju oli tahtlik, hakkab asja uurima. Kulub 10 aastat, enne kui ullatuslik suudlane lõpuks lõksu kukub: tulekahju oli suutamine ja seega Patricia mõrvati.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Parast peoõhtut teeb uks ema ootamatu avastuse, mis muudab terve sõpruskonna kahtlusalusteks. Samal ajal, kuiuurijad puuavad kiiresti mõistatust lahendada, viib veel uks jõhker runnak nad lõpuks kurjategijani.

programme.title: Ohtlikuimad hetked
programme.desc: Uurime, miks vabaronijal pole hirmu tundmatu ees; mis juhtub siis, kui vangistuses sundinud ja kasvanud hunt tutvub metsiku loodusega; naeme ekstreemsuusataja halvimat õudusunenagu; avastame, kuidas langevarjur hadaolukorras ellu jaab; uurime, kuidas ule 100-kilomeetrise tunnikiirusega tanavakelgul kihutaja valdib katastroofi ja olete tunnistajaks mehele, kes viib kerevedrustuse taiesti uuele tasemele.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Lihtsat kuritegu uurides satuvad korravalvurid jalile suurele rongiroovikatsele.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker maskeerub kodutuks, et leida rikkaid noori, kes vaeseid peksavad.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Roovitakse Alex ja rikas arimees, Walker peab nad leidma enne, kui nad tapetakse.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Halastamatud mõrvad ja rida relvastatud roove sunnivad Texase politseid ajaga võidu jooksma, et peatada jõhker noormees, eesrindlik tudeng ja kaks venda.

programme.title: Tere tulemast mõrvalinna
programme.desc: Idaho osariigis Kendrickis leitakse põlevast hoonest Donna Fontainei ja tema poiss-sõbra Fred Palahniuki surnukehad - nad on maha lastud. Vaikimise vandenõu kaitseb mõrvarit seni, kuni tema armukesed murduvad ja paljastavad suudimõistmiseks vajalikud tõendid.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Hamburgis, New Yorgis, kogevad kohalikud Toys "R" Us-i tootajad midagi kujuteldamatut, kui uks nende seast oise vahetuse ajal tapetakse. Äkitselt on kõik kolleegid kahtlusalused - kuid kas mõrtsukas on nende seas?

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: West Midlandsi politsei kuulab ule hadaabikõne kelleltki Pablo Hoadilt, kes teatas alguses, et tappis oma tudruksõbra, kuid hiljem selgitab ta, et see oli enesekaitse.

programme.title: Sõda
programme.desc: USA 2007 põnevik Lavastaja: Philip G. Atwell Osades: Jason Statham, Jet Li, John Lone, Steph Song Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) on FBI agent, kes puhendab ennast jaagitult, et tabada palgamõrvar (Jet Li), kes tappis tema paarimehe ja tolle pere. 3 aastat ei ole Jackil mingit edu, kuni uhel paeval ilmub mõrvar taas valja ja põhjustab linnas maffiasõja. Kogu selles segaduses naeb enda võimalust ka Jack, et lõpuks enda eesmark taita.

programme.title: Piirideta
programme.desc: Vincent peab uue bossi heaks panema toime roovi ning riskib politseile vahele jaamisega. Missioon on usalduseproov: keegi ei toota "Mustas kaes", ilma usaldust verega tõestamata. Lola satub globaliseerumisvastase aktivisti Virgili lummusesse, mis pahandab vaga Arthurit.

programme.title: SEAL Team
programme.desc: Bravo meeskond otsib uue terroriruhmituse juhti, kes juhib vagivaldset vastupanu Afganistani rahulabiraakimistele. Clayle saab selgeks, mida tahendab olla juht ning Sonny uritab parandada suhteid oma isaga Texases.

programme.title: Punane sekund
programme.desc: Koolitusprogramm "Vaarikas mootorsõidukijuht" toob kokku autojuhid, kel turjal parasjagu aastaid, aga ka kogemusi. Koolitaja utleb, et vanus on number, mille inimene kirjutab ise. Kuid millal oleks aeg autojuhtimisest loobuda? Meie rahvastik vananeb ja kumne aasta parast on ligi veerand kõikidest autojuhtidest vanemaealised.

programme.title: Ohtlikuimad hetked
programme.desc: Uurime, kuidas paar matkajat eluohtliku helikopterireisi ule elavad; avastame, kuidas uks tore paev võib surmaga lõppeda; naeme, kuidas uks pere Safari pargis paeva veetes taiesti mõtlematult kaitub; uurime, miks paev alligaatorite varjupaigas võib lõppeda naost ilma jaamisega; oleme tunnistajaks, kuidas libisemine jaisel liustikul põhjustab katastroofi ja naeme, kuidas kultuurifestival muutub eluohtlikuks.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walkeri sõber tapetakse pangaroovi kaigus; korravalvur võtab asja uurimise enda õlule.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker aitab oma tapetud sõbra perel raskel hetkel hakkama saada ning hoiab lapsi kuritegelikule teele minemast.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Trivettei kahtlustatakse 5 miljoni dollari varastamises ja ta kõrvaldatakse toolt.

programme.title: Mõrvarlikud sugulased
programme.desc: Maskides ja relvastatud meeste sissetung viib Houstoni arsti mõrvani, kes uritab kaitsta ennast, oma kodu ja perekonda.

programme.title: Tere tulemast mõrvalinna
programme.desc: Macks Creekis, Missouri osariigis mõrvatakse 42-aastane Trudy Darby. Kui kadunuks jaab veel kaks kohalikku naist, kahtlustab politsei sarimõrvari tegu. Linnas valitseb vaikus, kuni ootamatult saabunud kõne paljastab, et mõrvarid on lahemal, kui arvata võib.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Õhtu Chicagos kõrtsis lõpeb traagiliselt, kui koidikul leitakse julmalt labi pekstud surnukeha. Politsei uletab osariigi piire, et jalitada mõrvarit, kuid juhtumi lahendamiseks ja õigluse jalule seadmiseks laheb vaja ootamatut kõne ja jõhkrat reetmist.

programme.title: Kohtuekspertiis
programme.desc: Politseil on vaid inimese skelett, mille abil mõista ja kokku panna sundmuste jada, mis viis 10 aastat tagasi toimunud mõrvani.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Seiklusmarul 16-aastasest Hannast, kes on oma isa poolt treenitud tipptasemel palgamõrvariks. Oma esimesele missioonile minnes tuleb tudrukul rannata labi terve Euroopa, valtides teda jahtivaid agente, keda kasutava luureohvitseri hingel on loendamatuid musti saladusi. Oma lõplikule sihtmargile lahendes seisab Hanna aga silmitsi jahmatava paljastusega oma paritolu kohta...

programme.desc: Vincent peab paastma kurikuulsa Koskase naha. Alex satub hadaohtu. Juliette otsib vasimatult "maskis kohtumõistjat" ning hakkab jõudma Hydra saladusele aina lahemale.

programme.title: SEAL Team
programme.desc: Missiooni kaigus, mille eesmargiks on leida võimalik side terroristide uue juhiga, satub Bravo meeskond vaenlase korraldatud varitsusse. Sonny kaalub enda sisseseadmist oma kodulinnas.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Rose saab Alani sahkerdamisele jalile ja ahvardab kõigile ara raakida. Kuid siis saab Alan teada, et Rosei "abikaasa" on mannekeen ja saab ise raha valja pressima hakata. Charlie ja Rose sõidavad Pariisi nadalavahetust veetma.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.sub-title: Muidugi on ta surnud, II. Sarja viimane osa!

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Komoodiasarja peategelased Peg ja Al on olnud koos nii heas kui halvas - ja sedasi juba ule kahe aastakumne. Oma abielus on nad taiesti võrdsed pooled, sest ... mõlemad piinlevad! Seni pole Alil ja Peggyl olnud ainsatki sõpra, aga nuud kolivad kõrvalmajja Steve ja Marcy, kes on õnnelikult abielus, kuni nad Bundydest kuulevad. "Tuvikesi" peetakse tele-ajaloo uheks kõige veidramaks naljasarjaks, mille edu valemit pole suudetud (vaatamata loendamatutele katsetele) tanini korrata.

programme.title: Tuvikesed

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake ja Rosa konkureerivad rootslastest uurijatega, et uhte juveelivargust lahendada. Holt kutsub Charlesi oma partneriks seinatenniseturniirile, kui Kevin on linnast ara. Amy ja Terry aitavad Ginal astronoomiat õppida.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake jaab koos Boylei ja Ginaga parast sulgemist poodi luku taha ja just siis tulevad seda roovima kurjategijad, kes võtavad tootajad pantvangi. See annab Jakeile võimaluse oma lemmikfilm "Visa hing" paris elus labi mangida.

programme.title: Meie inimesed
programme.desc: Sven on kindlasti tegusam noormees kui paljud tema eakaaslased. Ta tudeerib korraga kahel erialal: tootab ulikoolis spetsialistina ja on vabatahtlikuna mitme projektiga seotud. See, et Svenil on liikumispuue, ei ole teda kunagi takistanud tegelemast sellega, mis talle huvi pakub. Režissoor Marten Vaher, autor-toimetaja Mirjam Matiisen, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Elmar TV
programme.desc: Raadiost Elmar tuttav Eesti muusika kullafond ja ka varsked kodumaised hitid hoiavad Eesti Kanalis oositi tuju uleval. Nostalgitse või laula kaasa, kodumaiste muusikavideote paremik on eetris!

programme.title: Laine laulab laevalael
programme.desc: Laulab ansambel "Laine" - Novella Hanson, Lagle Alpius, Viivi Laas, Lea Vetter, Kersti Johanson ja Katrin Kutševskaja Raivo Diksoni juhatusel. Filmitud Pirital ja kuunaril "Kihnu Jõnn". Kaasa teevad Vello Orumets, Elonna Spriit ja Ants Vahejaus. Režissoor Tiina Magi, operaator Kaljo Jõekalda.

programme.title: Lõngakera
programme.desc: Sari on mõeldud algajatele kudujatele ja kasitooarmastajatele, kes kull palju koovad, ent enamasti parem-pahempidises koes. Saated on ules ehitatud printsiibil, et harjutama peab liikudes lihtsamalt keerulisemale. Stuudios on Tiina Meeri, kes õpetab huvilistele erinevaid kudumisviise.

programme.title: Meie inimesed
programme.desc: Sven on kindlasti tegusam noormees kui paljud tema eakaaslased. Ta tudeerib korraga kahel erialal: tootab ulikoolis spetsialistina ja on vabatahtlikuna mitme projektiga seotud. See, et Svenil on liikumispuue, ei ole teda kunagi takistanud tegelemast sellega, mis talle huvi pakub. Režissoor Marten Vaher, autor-toimetaja Mirjam Matiisen, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Kelgukoerad
programme.desc: Telesari kriminaaluurijatest, kel tuleb lahendada kõige keerulisemad juhtumid ja tabada ohlikud kurjategijad.

programme.title: Ivo Linna Ameerika lugu
programme.desc: Reisisaade, milles elame kaasa Ivo Linna lahedatele rannakutele ookeani taga. Erakordne reis kestis 24 paeva ning 8000-kilomeetrit.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: "Pilvede all" on draamasari kolmest õest. See on uhe põlvkonna lugu - see on Pireti, Mari ja Kertu lugu, kuid see võib olla ka Sinu lugu.

programme.title: Klaver põõsas
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik muusikasaade; stuudios olev žurii hindab nelja pala, millest uks on ullatuslaul.

programme.title: Lemmikute lemmik
programme.desc: Lemmikloomasaade toob ekraanile toredad ja õpetlikud loomalood. Teeme tutvust veterinaaria tanapaevaste võimalustega ning anname sõna loomaspetsialistidele.

programme.title: Suur komoodiaõhtu
programme.desc: Tuntud naitlejad naerutavad vaatajat lõbusate sketšide, vaimukate paroodiate, ootamatute ulesannete, pooraste libauudiste ja muusikaliste viguritega.

programme.title: See pole lastesaade
programme.desc: "See pole lastesaade" on uus varjatud kaameratega filmitud saade, milles jalgitakse, kuidas lapsed ja taiskasvanud kaituvad, kui kontroll situatsiooni ule kaest hakkab libisema. Kummad saavad paremini hakkama?

programme.title: Meie inimesed
programme.desc: Sven on kindlasti tegusam noormees kui paljud tema eakaaslased. Ta tudeerib korraga kahel erialal: tootab ulikoolis spetsialistina ja on vabatahtlikuna mitme projektiga seotud. See, et Svenil on liikumispuue, ei ole teda kunagi takistanud tegelemast sellega, mis talle huvi pakub. Režissoor Marten Vaher, autor-toimetaja Mirjam Matiisen, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Kelgukoerad
programme.desc: Telesari kriminaaluurijatest, kel tuleb lahendada kõige keerulisemad juhtumid ja tabada ohlikud kurjategijad.

programme.title: Viimane võmm
programme.desc: 20 aastat koomas veetnud tippuurija Mikk Kotkas (Üllar Saaremae) arkab ja saab elus uue võimaluse. Rež. Gerda Kordemets.

programme.title: Meloodiaid estraadilt
programme.desc: Eesti heliloojate populaarseid estraadilaule esitavad Heli Laats, Jaak Joala, Helgi Sallo, Heidy Tamme, ansambel "Laine", trio koosseisus Uno Loop, Oleg Melnik, Paul Allik ja Kustas Kikerpuu ning Lembit Saarsalu ansambel. Teadustab Mati Talvik. Režissoor Elmo Loove, toimetaja Ülo Vinter.

programme.title: Meie inimesed
programme.desc: Martin on vaid 33-aastane, kuid elanud selle aja jooksul justkui juba mitme inimese elu. Ta on teinud tõsist karjaari kaitsevaes; kainud Afganistanis missioonil; labinud valjaõppeid, mida peetakse maailma uhtedeks fuusiliselt raskemateks; rajanud turvafirma, et kaitsta India ookeanil laevu piraatide eest; kirjutanud romaani ja mitme kogumiku jagu luuletusi; olnud modelliks; katsetanud seriaalinaitlejana ning nuud otsustanud rajada suure maadluskeskuse, et just seda spordiala Eestis oluliselt edendada. Lisaks sellele on tal pere, kus kasvab neli last. Autor Grete Lõbu, režissoor Tarvo Molder, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Kelgukoerad
programme.desc: Telesari kriminaaluurijatest, kel tuleb lahendada kõige keerulisemad juhtumid ja tabada ohlikud kurjategijad.

programme.title: Igavene tuli
programme.desc: Arne Oidi laule esitavad Heli Laats, Marju Kuut, Heidy Tamme, Jaak Joala, Voldemar Kuslap, Uno Loop ja Bruno Oja. Režissoor Elmo Loove.

programme.title: Meie inimesed
programme.desc: Inge, kes on oma elu puhendanud lastele ja nende aitamisele, juhib Võrumaa Lastekaitse Ühingut ning tegutseb Eesti Kasuperede Liidus. Oma igapaevatood teeb naine Lasva valla lasteaia direktorina. Tema enda perre kuulub kokku uksteist last - viis bioloogilist ja kuus kasulast. programme.title: Miss Fisheri mõrvalood
programme.desc: 1964: kui Peregrine Fisheri tundmatu tadi jaab kadunuks, parib naine sullekukkunud varanduse ja peab tõestama, et tal on piisavalt nutti, et saada maailmatasemel eradetektiiviks.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui verise hukkamise kaigus tapetakse viskiparun ja tema pere, varbab Murdoch appi Ogdeni, et ainsalt tunnistajalt uksikasju valja meelitada. Ent Jacob Quincannon on šokis ega suuda midagi meenutada.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Parast autoõnnetust tuleb noorpaar uimasesse Lymstocki linnakesse kosuma ja puhkama, ent alevik kubiseb laimust ja anonuumkirjadest, mis tõukavad Mona Symmingtoni enesetapuni. Õnneks tuleb samal ajal matustele miss Marple, kes asub agaralt asja uurima.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Elizal on võimalus teenida tasu, mis võiks muuta ta elu, kui ta pakub abi sissenõudmata varanduse parijale; ta vajab hertsogi abi, kuid paljastus tema kohta muudab koostoo võimatuks.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Amanda kutsub Sidney oma pulma laulatajaks. Sidney uurib samal ajal tema kirikus kainud naise surma, sest naine kinnitas, et tulevane vaimees mõrvab ta. Mrs Maguire kutsub inspektor Keatingi asja uurima, kui surnuna leitakse ka lahkunud naise õde.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Tommy ja Tuppence kulastavad vanadekodus oma vana tadi ja on hammingus sealsest veidrast ning salastavast õhkkonnast. Kui tadi Ada sureb ja tema sõbranna jaljetult kaob, laheb noormeestel vaja miss Marplei abi.

programme.title: Suured loomad, vaiksed loomad
programme.desc: Skeldaleis on jõulud ja Siegfried peab otsustama, kas kaitsta Tristanit Riveri heaolu arvelt; vahepeal mõistab proua Hall, et ta peab silmitsi seisma oma tunnetega Geraldi vastu.

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Elizal on võimalus teenida tasu, mis võiks muuta ta elu, kui ta pakub abi sissenõudmata varanduse parijale; ta vajab hertsogi abi, kuid paljastus tema kohta muudab koostoo võimatuks.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Amanda kutsub Sidney oma pulma laulatajaks. Sidney uurib samal ajal tema kirikus kainud naise surma, sest naine kinnitas, et tulevane vaimees mõrvab ta. Mrs Maguire kutsub inspektor Keatingi asja uurima, kui surnuna leitakse ka lahkunud naise õde.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Murdochil on au osaleda konverentsil, kus tunnustatakse 20. sajandi helgemaid paid. Kui leiutaja Nikola Tesla kaob, peab Murdoch kõnepidamise asemel tegutsema hakkama.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Brackenreid viibib Bernard Helmsworthy valdustes rebasejahil, kui koerad leiavad mehe surnukeha. Juurdlus paljastab sabotaaži, kui leitakse ka puude vahele tõmmatud noor.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Tommy ja Tuppence kulastavad vanadekodus oma vana tadi ja on hammingus sealsest veidrast ning salastavast õhkkonnast. Kui tadi Ada sureb ja tema sõbranna jaljetult kaob, laheb noormeestel vaja miss Marplei abi.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui mõrvatuna leitakse Murdochi ja Ogdeni naaber Ray Huckabee, peavad nad pistma rinda millegi palju ebameeldivamaga - kuhjuvate tõenditega, mis viitavad sellele, et Murdoch on tapja.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui juuksurisalongi omaniku surm õnnetuseks kuulutatakse, kahtlustavad Ogden ja Effie siiski rapast mangu. Uurija Graham Irwin usub, et naine oli purjus ja lõi pea ara.

programme.title: Viini veri
programme.desc: Viinis toimuvad sarimõrvad osutuvad seotuks Austria-Ungari keisririigi sudamest lekkivate riigisaladustega. Max ja Oskar riskivad kõigega, et paljastada reeturi isik.

programme.title: Sissi
programme.desc: Printsess Sisi oli Euroopa esimene superstaar. Muretu teismelisena armus ta võimukasse ja ihaldusvaarsesse mehesse, kellel oli ka oma sunge ja ohtlik pool. Sisi peab langetama tõsise valiku ja võtab valjakutse vastu.

programme.title: Joan
programme.desc: Sari põhineb Briti kuulsaima naissoost juveelivarga Joan Hanningtoni elul. See jutustab loo naise teekonnast viletsatest oludest osavate teemantivargusteni 1980. aastate Londonis.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Brackenreid viibib Bernard Helmsworthy valdustes rebasejahil, kui koerad leiavad mehe surnukeha. Juurdlus paljastab sabotaaži, kui leitakse ka puude vahele tõmmatud noor.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui mõrvatuna leitakse Murdochi ja Ogdeni naaber Ray Huckabee, peavad nad pistma rinda millegi palju ebameeldivamaga - kuhjuvate tõenditega, mis viitavad sellele, et Murdoch on tapja.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui juuksurisalongi omaniku surm õnnetuseks kuulutatakse, kahtlustavad Ogden ja Effie siiski rapast mangu. Uurija Graham Irwin usub, et naine oli purjus ja lõi pea ara.

programme.title: Viini veri
programme.desc: Viinis toimuvad sarimõrvad osutuvad seotuks Austria-Ungari keisririigi sudamest lekkivate riigisaladustega. Max ja Oskar riskivad kõigega, et paljastada reeturi isik.

programme.title: Sissi
programme.desc: Printsess Sisi oli Euroopa esimene superstaar. Muretu teismelisena armus ta võimukasse ja ihaldusvaarsesse mehesse, kellel oli ka oma sunge ja ohtlik pool. Sisi peab langetama tõsise valiku ja võtab valjakutse vastu.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Tommy ja Tuppence kulastavad vanadekodus oma vana tadi ja on hammingus sealsest veidrast ning salastavast õhkkonnast. Kui tadi Ada sureb ja tema sõbranna jaljetult kaob, laheb noormeestel vaja miss Marplei abi.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
programme.desc: Tugeva õiglustundega politseinik, peainspektor George Gently tootab oma noore seersandi Bacchusi abiga keset Northumberlandi vapustavaid kunkaid ja rannikualasid, et lahendada kuritegusid.

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Eliza saab kirjapommi; kes selle saatis ja miks? Ta teeb koostood hertsogi, Mosese ja tema vana vaenlase Patrick Nashiga, et teada saada, kes saatis selle surmava saadetise.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Sidney Chambers on Grantchesteri vikaar; tõugatuna ohtlikku valede, reetmise ja mõrvade maailma, leiab Sidney, et on oma uues "detektiivi" ametis suureparane.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Rongide arajaamise tõttu on Exhamptoni hotell puupusti rahvast tais ja miss Marple on sunnitud oobima uksildases Sittafordis. Majaomanikuks osutub tuntud poliitik Trevelyan, kellest loodetakse jargmist peaministrit. Õige pea selgub, et Trevelyani elu on ohus ja miss Marple on just õigel ajal õiges kohas.

programme.title: Suured loomad, vaiksed loomad
programme.desc: On 1940. aasta lihavõtted ning James ja Helen unistavad mangivaid lapsi vaadates tulevikust. Tristani eemalolek annab kliinikus valusalt tunda. James uritab paasta õnnetus seisus koera, kahtlustades looma omanikku koera vaarkohtlemises. Audrey peab langetama raske otsuse.

programme.title: Inspektor George Gently
