programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick paneb sireenid huilgama, siirdudes otsima oma isiklikku tuletõrjeautot. Corey ja Rick reisivad aga ajas tagasi 1970ndatesse, jalitades kuulsalt ajakirjanikult Hunter S Thompsonilt parit erilist eset.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui nende veoauto katki laheb, panevad Ton ja Allen kõik mangu, et koguda raha selle parandamiseks. Nad saavad lauajalgpalli, Tommy Guni trummid ja Toni rõõmuks terve laari Twinkiesi koogikesi, kuid kas sellest piisab?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Mehed võitlevad oma ageda endise tootajaga, samal ajal, kui hinnakergitaja ahvardab paeva ara rikkuda. Kui kõik lootus naib olevat kadunud, on monsterauto rehvide komplekt ja salaparane kast nende viimaseks võimaluseks võitjaks saada.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Teame vagevat tragoodiat Medusast, Kreeka mutoloogia kurikuulsaimast naispahalasest, kelle pilk kõik elusolendid kiviks muutis. Ent millisel tõestisundinud lool see muut põhineb? Ehk võib oine taevas meile selle loo sunni kohta vihjeid anda?

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: In the fall of 1952, witnesses in Flatwoods, West Virginia, reportedly encountered a creature with reptilian skin in a strange craft. As sightings continue, MonsterQuest attempts to uncover the beast that has terrorised this town for sixty years.

programme.title: Iidne võimatu
programme.desc: Tanapaeval on sõdurid varustatud kõige moodsama sõjatehnikaga. Ent millised moodsad relvad ja kaitsevahendid kuulusid iidsete sõdalaste varustusse?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Teame vagevat tragoodiat Medusast, Kreeka mutoloogia kurikuulsaimast naispahalasest, kelle pilk kõik elusolendid kiviks muutis. Ent millisel tõestisundinud lool see muut põhineb? Ehk võib oine taevas meile selle loo sunni kohta vihjeid anda?

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: In the fall of 1952, witnesses in Flatwoods, West Virginia, reportedly encountered a creature with reptilian skin in a strange craft. As sightings continue, MonsterQuest attempts to uncover the beast that has terrorised this town for sixty years.

programme.title: Iidne võimatu
programme.desc: Tanapaeval on sõdurid varustatud kõige moodsama sõjatehnikaga. Ent millised moodsad relvad ja kaitsevahendid kuulusid iidsete sõdalaste varustusse?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Greatest discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Lue Elizondo oli varasemalt tuvastanud UFO-de viis jalgitavat omadust, mida nimetatakse "viieks oluliseks omaduseks". Ent on ka kuues omadus, mida Elizondo uurima asus - nahtamatu oht, mida need õhusõidukid endast kujutada võivad.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas USA sõjavael võib tõesti salajane kosmoseprogramm olla? Kui nii, kas me valmistume siis kosmosesõjaks teiste riikide või koguni teiste liikide vastu?

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: At the Battle of Isandlwana in 1879, Zulu warriors overwhelmed an occupying British army in what became Englands worst defeat at the hands of a colonial force. Join modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, to discover their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iraagis ja Suurias on meelega havitatud tuhandeid iidseid esemeid ja reliikviaid. Tiibeti kiltmaal ja Kesk-Aafrika džunglites on sustemaatiliselt havitatud puhakirju. Kas see kõik võib toimuda etteplaanitult?

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: ISIS rahastas oma mõrvarlikku režiimi, ruustades maad ja muues saaki enampakkujaile. Kuid kas edasimuujad, oksjonimajad, muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid tunnistavad, et nad rahastasid otseselt mõrvu ja veresauna?

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: The Offspring - Rock AM
programme.desc: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984. Originally formed under the name Manic Subsidal, the bands lineup consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Bryan "Dexter" Holland, bassist Todd Morse and lead guitarist Kevin "Noodles" Wasserman.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Radiohead was formed when its members were attending Abingdon School in Oxfordshire After a succession of local shows, On A Friday were signed to EMI. They enlisted Grunge producer Paul Kolderie for their first release "Creep". In 2011 Radiohead released "The King of Limbs", once more they experimented with new studio techniques to create the album. Radiohead, are the most influential band of the modern era. You wouldnt have Coldplay without Radiohead

programme.title: Guns N Roses - Live From the O2 Arena London
programme.desc: Watch this mega-production of Guns N Roses performing live at the O2 Arena to its fans singing and vibrating to each song. Includes; Paradise City, Sweet Child O Mine, November Rain and many more.

programme.title: AC/DC - Hells Highway
programme.desc: Awesome great live performance from AC/DC.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Live at Tokyo Dome
programme.desc: Red Hot Chili Peppers after the return of John Frusciante, who has come to Japan for the first time in 16 years in 2023!

programme.title: Beyonce - Sound of Change
programme.desc: The Sound Of Change was a benefit concert held at Twickenham Stadium, London, England, as part of the Chime For Change initiative, founded by Beyonce with the help of actress Salma Hayek and Guccis creative director, Frida Giannini.

programme.title: Pop Profile
programme.desc: Experience the stories of the stars through their major hit singles. We chart their career from the earliest performances to the present, via breakthrough singles, concerts and signings with major labels. Featuring: Foo Fighters

programme.title: Paul McCartney _ The Space Within US
programme.desc: Paul McCartneys The Space Within US was released in November 2006. It is composed of footage taken during his fall 2005 "US" Tour in the United States in conjunction with his Chaos and Creation in the Backyard album release, though some of his Beatles songs and songs from his previous albums are also performed.

programme.title: Milky Chance - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The German duet is back and better than ever! Milky Chance is the success story of two school friends, Clemens Rehbein and Philipp Dausch. After a long break, 2017 marks the release of a second, long-waited, album ""Blossom"". And, for the public, finally the occasion to discover live these new compositions, mixing rock, folk and electro pop. With reggae vibrations that can rub shoulders with house elements, Milky Chance has one of the most singular sounds. With the presence of musicians on stage, and if we believe the listening of the new record, we can expect more electric concerts, more electronic and even more energetic than in the past!

programme.title: Jessie J - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Electric Light Orchestra - Live at Wembley
programme.desc: Captured live at Londons Wembley Arena and directed by Mike Mansfield this space-age show will live forever in rock history as, quite literally, out of this world featuring a pioneering laser display, the first of its kind that set a precedent for subsequent rock shows. Standing in the Rain, Night in The Rain, Turn to Stone, Tight Rope, Telephone Line, Rock Aria, Wild West Hero, Show Down, Sweet Talking Woman, Roll Over Beethoven.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: David Bowie was the leading figure in popular music for over five decades. Acclaimed by critics and musicians for his innovative work. His career was marked by reinvention and visual presentation, his music and stagecraft significantly influencing popular music. During his lifetime, his record sales, estimated at 140 million albums worldwide, made him one of the bestselling music artists. He stopped concert touring after 2004 and his last live performance was at a charity event in 2006. In 2013, Bowie returned from a decade-long recording hiatus with the release of The Next Day. He remained musically active until his Death two days after the release of his final album, Blackstar.

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Live at Tokyo Dome
programme.desc: Red Hot Chili Peppers after the return of John Frusciante, who has come to Japan for the first time in 16 years in 2023!

programme.title: Beyonce - Sound of Change
programme.desc: The Sound Of Change was a benefit concert held at Twickenham Stadium, London, England, as part of the Chime For Change initiative, founded by Beyonce with the help of actress Salma Hayek and Guccis creative director, Frida Giannini.

programme.title: Pop Profile
programme.desc: Experience the stories of the stars through their major hit singles. We chart their career from the earliest performances to the present, via breakthrough singles, concerts and signings with major labels. Featuring: Foo Fighters

programme.title: Pharrell Williams - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Pharrell Williams performs his hits including "Marilyn Monroe", "Come Get It Bae", "Happy" and many more.

programme.title: Oasis
programme.desc: Filmed at Wembley Arena, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Oasis featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Champagne Supernova, Dont Look Back In Anger, "Rock N Roll Star" and many more.

programme.title: James Taylor (JTQ) _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Britney Spears _ Live from London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Britney Spears performs her hits including "Baby One More Time", "Oops! I Did It Again", "Toxic" and many more.

programme.title: The Lumineers - Live At Musilac
programme.desc: The Lumineers bring energetic American folk-rock to the picturesque Musilac Festival. You wont be able to resist clapping along and stomping your feet to the bands raw sound and enchanting music.

programme.title: Childish Gambino - Live at Rockwood Music Hall
programme.desc: Its been a crazy year for Donald Glover, but nothing has been more blazing than his career as rapper Childish Gambino. The project, born of a Wu-Tang name generator, is full of witty, rambunctious energy, as he effortlessly demonstrates in his session at Rockwood Music Hall. Along with collaborator and musical guru Ludwig Gransson on electric guitar, Gambino rips through tracks from his wildly popular EP as well as the lead single from his debut album Camp (out now on Glassnote Records). From introspection to love to pop culture and punny metaphors, Gambino runs an impressive lyrical gammit, one that inspires all the vital decision making organs.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Paul Rodgers - Free Spirit
programme.desc: The 16-song collection, Free Spirit, filmed in London, England returned Paul Rodgers to his roots, bringing fans an extraordinary evening celebrating the music of Free.

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Live From the Florida Theater
programme.desc: Earlier this year Lynyrd Skynyrd performed their first two studio albums, "Pronounced Lĕh-nerd Skin-nerd" and "Second Helping", live in their entirety for the first time, at two specially staged concerts at the Florida Theatre in their home town of Jacksonville, Florida. It was a special occasion for both the act and their fans as the band performed tracks theyd never or rarely played live before alongside classic songs that are an essential part of any Lynyrd Skynyrd live show. These unique concerts are a must have for any Lynyrd Skynyrd fan.

programme.title: a-ha - Unplugged
programme.desc: The first a-ha MTV Unplugged Concert ever. The album "MTV Unplugged – Summer Solstice" is being released including a very special LIVE experience.Share the impressive unplugged concert with a-ha in front of astonishing scenery on the picturesque island of Giske, located on the Norwegian coastline.Experience the concert including some hit singles like "Take On Me", "The Sun Always Shines On TV", and "The Living Daylights" as well as two new Songs.

programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys
programme.sub-title: Pet Shop Boys: Live at Roskilde 2009
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: Motorhead - Rock Im Park
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Motorhead

programme.title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken
programme.sub-title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken: Live in Chicago
programme.desc: John Mellencamps career in music, spanning more than 42 years, has seen him transition from pop star to one of the most highly regarded songwriters of a generation. Filmed at the landmark Chicago Theatre, just 250 miles away from his upbringing in Indiana, this cinematic concert documentary film captures John Mellencamp reflecting on his career accompanied by self-narration from his highly personal audio diary on his Midwestern upbringing, career and outlook on life as a whole. Meant to be more than just your run of the mill concert film, this intimate performance with full band will fully envelop the viewer into the Mellencamp mindset. "My vision was true, and my heart was too. And there was no end to what I could dream. Life is short, even in its longest days."

programme.title: Tom Petty and The Heartbreakers - Live at Soundstage
programme.desc: Filmed live from the Vic Theatre, Chicago, Illinois, USA in April 2003 for the "Soundstage" TV series.

programme.title: Kiss - Live in Nurburgring
programme.desc: Kiss is one of the legendary groups in Hard Rock history. They have millions of fans around the world and over 100 million records sold. KISS confirms why they have been the best on the scene for nearly four decades, in a performance that made history, impressing an audience of more than 85,000 people, in a show of more than 2 hours and packed with hits, held at the Nurburgring, Germany in 2010.

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: Classic Albums: Elton John - Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
programme.desc: This episode of the CLASSIC ALBUMS series uses interviews with Sir Elton and his songwriting partner Bernie Taupin, archival footage of the demo sessions, and rare live performances to tell the story behind the canonical album.

programme.title: Lenny Kravitz - Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Lenny Kravitz has been consolidated as one of the stars that has been in force for a long time, this has led him to appear all over the world and be part of the most popular festivals in the world. This is how on September 26, 2014 he was invited to participate in one of the UKs most popular festivals, the iTunes Festival, giving his audience a great concert at the Roundhouse of London.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons _ Live At The Moody Theater
programme.desc: Filmed at The Moody Theater, Texas, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Imagine Dragons featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Demons, "Radioactive" and many more….

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Gwen Stefani - This is What the Truth Feels Like Tour
programme.desc: This is What The Truth Feels Like is a Gwen Stefani tour made to publicize her album, with the same name. The tour was done in the United States and Canada in 2016.

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: The Black Keys _ Live at Main Square Festival
programme.desc: Main Square Festival is a music festival that takes place in Arras, France, lasting three days.

programme.title: R.E.M.
programme.desc: Filmed at Arena Civica, Milan, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic R.E.M. featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Losing My Religion, Drive, "Man On the Moon" and many more.

programme.title: lovelytheband _ Live at Baeble HQ
programme.desc: Formed in West Hollywood in 2016, lovelytheband features former Oh Honey member Mitchy Collins along with guitarist Jordan Greenwald and drummer Sam Price. The band debuted in July 2017 with the Christian Medice-produced "Broken," a sprightly and infectious single that quickly racked up over three million digital streams. Signing with Another Century Records, lovelytheband released their debut EP "Everything I Could" in September of that year and joined Vance Joy and AWOLNATION on tour. In April 2018, "Broken" was still going strong and hit number one on the Billboard Alternative Songs Airplay chart. That August, lovelytheband returned with their full-length debut album, Finding It Hard to Smile. Once again produced by longtime collaborator Christian Medice, the album included "Broken" as well as the single "These Are My Friends." Enjoy their show in Los Angeles!

programme.desc: This is What The Truth Feels Like is a Gwen Stefani tour made to publicize her album, with the same name. The tour was done in the United States and Canada in 2016.

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: The Moody Blues - Days of Future Passed Live
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of their landmark album, Days of Future Passed, The Moody Blues took to the road to perform the entire LP live. This film, capturing an electric evening at The Sony Centre, Toronto, where the band was joined on stage by a full orchestra for the first time ever, is the definitive performance of this seminal album. This spectacle of a show features stunning visuals and a unique narration performed by Jeremy Irons, transporting the audience and viewer to the psychedelic dream world of their classic record. Including the iconic hits Nights In White Satin and Tuesday Afternoon, this film truly pays homage to five decades of musical mastery. In this impressive yet intimate auditorium, The Moody Blues have never sounded better.

programme.title: How (Not) to Get Rid of a Body
programme.desc: After a young Ohio man vanishes without a trace, detectives embark on an investigation involving a love triangle, drugs, and murder.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: When a married woman is crowned Playmate of the Year, she is drawn to another man. Afraid of losing his meal ticket, her husband shoots them both while in their home.

programme.title: O.J. and Nicole
programme.sub-title: O.J. and Nicole: An American Tragedy
programme.desc: Tanya Brown, sister of Nicole Brown Simpson, explores O.J. and Nicoles tumultuous relationship and the infamous trial of the century.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: True crime series exploring the unexpected disappearances of people in the USA and the difficulty the police have with solving the mysteries. After members of the community vanish without a trace, law enforcement officials are tasked with tracking them down before they become a victim. These detectives, along with determined loved ones, spend years agonizing over minute details that could help them understand what led to the disappearance of seemingly untroubled people. With some cases taking decades to solve, Gone looks at the impact this has on friends and family members seeking closure.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?
programme.desc: Shocking revelations ensue in this deceptive documentary series, where marital relationships built on lies are examined, revealing cases of betrayal, bemusement, and sheer audacity. Featuring dramatised reconstructions and interviews with the spouses involved, each episode tells a story about a particular relationship that has fallen apart after an outrageous discovery. These husbands and wives thought they were marrying their soulmates, but after noticing something peculiar about their better half, they decided to investigate further, revealing cases of double-lives, criminal activity, even sinister killings.

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A true crime show with a twist - the chiling stories are told from the fictionalised first-person pespective of the victim. The stories reveal that victims are often normal, average Americans with everyday dreams and concerns about money, their relationshiips, their jobs, their family, etc. who fall prey to the betrayal of friends, colleagues, family members or lovers. The motives vary in each epsiode, from jealousies concerning an extramarital affair to robbery, personal vendettas and secret ambitions. The show uses dramatised recreations of the events to bring the viewer closer to the people involved and also includes interviews with the victims family and the detectives who investigated the crime.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. It is hosted by Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor who has never lost a murder case. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Following Roo Powell, a 38-year-old child advocate, and her team at non-profit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) as they conduct an undercover operation to identify and stop adult predators who use the internet to harm the most vulnerable. With the help of her team, Roo transforms into a teen to reveal the identities of the men who reach out to her.

programme.title: Juhtumit uurib Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: Juhtumit uurib Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: The Night That Didnt End
programme.desc: Family and friends of a murdered victim never forget. The painful memories, visions and hopes for what could have been remain etched in their memory. For law enforcement officials, these memories and details can provide valuable clues that help detectives trace their final steps and identify possible culprits. With images from the crime scenes at the time of the investigations and told through relatives, friends and the officers that pursued the cases, this documentary series examines chilling murders from across the USA.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Predator at Large
programme.sub-title: Hes Gonna Do It To Your Daughter
programme.desc: Not just found in the wild, natural world, predators can be human too, stalking out their prey in a sinister and disturbing manner. This documentary explores stories from across the United States, where evil killers lurk in the shadows, waiting for the opportune moment to strike. With testimonies from friends, family, and loved ones of victims, law enforcement officers who worked on the cases, and the people closest to the perpetrators, the series reveals chilling tales of horrific, terrifying murders. These sadistic predators are the stuff of nightmares, using the darkness as their cover to commit brutal crimes.

Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Bad Henry
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of 1990s Charlotte, a city divided by racial tensions, raging gang violence and drug crime, this documentary series reveals the story of an even more sinister atrocity, that of the serial killer Henry Louis Wallace. When the body of Brandi Henderson is found strangled in her Charlotte home, police recognize that it is the second such murder in three weeks and that they have a serial killer on their hands. With a pattern emerging across the city of young African American women being raped and strangled to death, this show tells how detective Garry McFadden, the only African American on the homicide squad at the time, and his dedicated team at the Charlotte-Mecklenburg police department tracked and caught this ruthless killer.

programme.title: Bad Henry

programme.title: Does Murder Sleep?
programme.desc: In 2010, Greg Fleniken was found murdered in a Texas hotel. The case runs cold until a Long Island PI uncovers a chilling conspiracy that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Does Murder Sleep?
programme.desc: In 2009, 61-year-old Wendy DiRodio is murdered in her home. Police quickly make a disturbing discovery, leading them to wonder if a serial killer is at large.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A mum and her 10-year-old son are shot dead in their home. A note at the scene tells one story, but the truth may be something entirely different.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: When a young mum disappears, theres no shortage of men in town for police to question. And, a seven-month-old baby is taken from his crib.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: I Went Undercover
programme.desc: The remarkable stories of everyday people who went undercover to help solve a murder. They reveal how they worked with police to bring a killer to justice.

programme.title: O.J. and Nicole
programme.sub-title: O.J. and Nicole: An American Tragedy
programme.desc: Tanya Brown, sister of Nicole Brown Simpson, explores O.J. and Nicoles tumultuous relationship and the infamous trial of the century.

programme.title: I Went Undercover
programme.desc: An illicit love triangle ends in murder. When secret tapes emerge, a tale of friendship, love and betrayal engulfs a small Missouri town.

programme.title: I Went Undercover
programme.desc: The remarkable stories of everyday people who went undercover to help solve a murder. They reveal how they worked with police to bring a killer to justice.

programme.title: Does Murder Sleep?
programme.desc: In 2010, Greg Fleniken was found murdered in a Texas hotel. The case runs cold until a Long Island PI uncovers a chilling conspiracy that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Murdepunkt
programme.desc: Spordikomoodia. Tahumatu suhtlusmaneeriga profitennisist Jimmy tahaks jõuda paarismangus tipptasemele. Kuna ta armastab juua ja kohtunikke sõimata, siis hoiavad teised tema tasemel mangijad tast eemale. Mehel ei jaa muud ule, kui kutsuda partneriks oma võõrandunud noorem vend Darren. Luuserist vend on oma eluga parasjagu madalseisus, kui nõustub vastumeelselt Jimmyga palliplatsile tulema. Siit edasi saab ju asi ainult paremaks minna…

programme.title: Kokad kulas
programme.desc: Qu ja Jock reisivad labi Clarei oru ja mooda Yorkei poolsaart, otsides kohalikke saaduseid ning einestavad veiniistanduses sealse pruulmeistriga. Et jagada Jockiga oma varajasi mõjutajaid, kutsub Qu ta einestama koos enda perega Shandongi kulasse, kus ta ules kasvas.

programme.title: Kahvlilegendid
programme.desc: Buddy kulastab kahte restorani, mille legendaarsed menuud keerlevad uhe staarkoostisosa umber. Esmalt suundub ta Michigani osariigis Detroidis asuvasse restorani Sweet Potato Sensations, mis on juba ule 40 aasta toonud revolutsioonilisi muutusi bataadi soomise viisidesse. Seejarel suundub ta Illinois osariigis Chicagosse asuvasse armastatud takorestorani Carnitas Uruapan, mille lavataheks on sealiha. Restorani igipõliste toiduvalmistusvõtetega valminud aeglaselt kupsetatud carnitased panevad inimesed jarjekorras seisma, just nagu Mehhiko valiturgudel.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: CSI - eliit mõrvauurimise ruhm. Neile ei jaa ukski kuritegu ega mõrv lahendamata. Piisab vaid uhest sõrmejaljest, juuksekarvast või kuuliaugust ja mõrvar võib kindel olla, et ta tabatakse.

programme.title: Haneema
programme.desc: Hooaja viimane! Koosolek Kolumbia saatkonnas kujuneb pantvangidraamaks. Barry poorab kattemaksuhoos mangulaual kaardid segi ja Sonjat ootab seetõttu ees senisest suurim ohverdus, mida ta eales oma pere heaks tegema on pidanud.

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Helena meistriklassis tutvutakse teemaga, mis kuulub iga koka põhioskuste hulka - noakasutuse ja hakkimisega. Meistriklassis õpitakse ka salati viimist uuele tasemele.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Kui lapsed kodutoode vastu protesteerivad, otsustavad ka vanemad streikima hakata.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam kahtlustab, et Katei poiss-sõber Tyler võib olla kanepisuitsetaja ning otsustab ta vahele võtta, kuid Andi ei toeta teda selles ettevõtmises. Don selgitab Lowellile kontorireegleid, kuid viimane kahtlustab, et need on valjamõeldud ning ahvardab sellekohase tõe ametlikult valja selgitada.

programme.title: Miss Fallaci
programme.desc: Oriana saab kutse peole, mis on tais Hollywoodi staare ning uritab neid intervjueerida. Ta avastab, et naitlejad kardavad ajakirjandust ning eelistavad end peol mitte vabaks lasta, kui sattuda ajaleheveergudele.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Kriminalistid saavad teate Warricki surmast. Kas Warricki tapjal õnnestub teine politseinik tema mõrvas suudi lavastada?

programme.title: Nukusaate mõrvad
programme.desc: Roppude naljadega vurtstatud must krimikomoodia. Filmi tegevus leiab aset Los Angelese rapases allilmas, kus kulg-kulje kõrval elavad nukud ja inimesed. Kui keegi armastatud 1990-ndate nukusaate endiseid osataitjaid jõhkralt mõrvama kukub, asuvad kuritegusid koos lahendama kaks vastuolulist uurijat - neist uks on nukk ja teine inimene (Melissa McCarthy "Spioon").

programme.title: Ebaõnne romanss
programme.desc: Nuudisaegne armastuslugu, mis on inspireeritud tunnustatud Ameerika laulja ja laulukirjutaja Todd Snideri põhjapanevast hitist "Just Like Old Times". "Ebaõnne romanss" raagib mehest nimega Jesse (Michael Dorman). Ta on karismaatiline, kuid õnnetu trubaduur, kes elab odavates motellides ja teeb oma elus halbu otsuseid. Kohtudes juhuslikult vana armuleegi Carlaga (Sophia Bush), satub Jesse eksistentsiaalsele ristteele, sest nende keeruline minevik ja uued probleemid ahvardavad havitada nende õndsa taaskohtumise.

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Raivo ja Rait jõuavad naistega Parsia lahe suurimale saarele Qeshm ja plaan on saarele ring peale teha. Et saar on paradiisiks ornitoloogidele, kaiakse Queshmil põnevaid linde otsimas. Samuti saab saarel mekkida kaamelipiima või kulastada soolakoobast. Õhtul tagasi mandrile jõudes võetakse uueks sihiks kuumaveeallikad, kuid seltskond satub hoopiski suurde lõbustusparki. Kuna muu maastik telkimist ei võimalda, tuleb eestlastel telgid pusti panna otse lõbustuspargi parklasse, kohalike noorte peo keskpunkti.

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Raivo ja Rait jõuavad naistega Parsia lahe suurimale saarele Qeshm ja plaan on saarele ring peale teha. Et saar on paradiisiks ornitoloogidele, kaiakse Queshmil põnevaid linde otsimas. Samuti saab saarel mekkida kaamelipiima või kulastada soolakoobast. Õhtul tagasi mandrile jõudes võetakse uueks sihiks kuumaveeallikad, kuid seltskond satub hoopiski suurde lõbustusparki. Kuna muu maastik telkimist ei võimalda, tuleb eestlastel telgid pusti panna otse lõbustuspargi parklasse, kohalike noorte peo keskpunkti.

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Kui kõik temast ametijarjekorras kõrgemal olnud isikud katastroofilises runnakus surma saavad, saab ebaolulisest valitsuskabineti liikmest Ameerika Ühendriikide president.

programme.title: Haneema
programme.desc: Uus hooaeg! Kolm aastat on moodas ajast, mil Sonja oma surma lavastas ja Majori identiteedi ule võttis. Sonja ja Lukas ajavad oma arisid nuud Oslos. Kui uks kohtumine viltu laheb, teevad and otsuse kuritegelikust maailmast lõplikult taanduda.

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Võistlejad peavad oma maitsemeeled kasutusele võtma, sest kahes voorust koosnev pingeulesanne algab maitsmisega, mille kaigus tuleb tunda ara makroonide maitseid. Kaks parimat maitsete aratundjat paasevad rõdule hinge tõmbama ja teised hakkavad taas valjalangemispinge all toitu valmistama.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam peab palkama uue projektijuhi ning Andi suudistab teda meeskandidaatide eelistamises.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam ja Andi puuavad naabritele selle eest tagasi teha, et keegi nende korraldatud õhtusoogile ei ilmunud.

programme.title: Joone peal
programme.desc: Louisianas sundinud ning Californias Comptonis elav Richard Williams unistas imelaste kasvatamisest mangus, millega tal endal oli vahe kogemusi. Tennis oli ajalooliselt olnud kõrgklassi spordiala ja helevalge golfiklubikultuuri lahutamatu osa ning Williamsid olid selles ulimad erandid. Nad tungisid areenile harukordse kara, ootusarevuse ja mõningase skeptitsismi saatel - ent tudrukutel oli piisavalt vastupidavust ja puhast annet, et vaimustust õigustada. Tenniseplatsil kõvad konkurendid olnud õed jaid kestvale kriitikale ja rassimist nõretavatele kuulujuttudele vaatamata taiuslikeks professionaalideks.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Ühe naise ebatõenaoline enesetapp seostatakse pangaroovi ja hupnotisooriga. Kriminalistid uurivad karjaarinõustaja-hasartmangusõltlase mõrva. Sara aitab kaasa eutanaasiajuhtumi juurdluses.

programme.title: Noa laev
programme.desc: Suurejooneline seiklusdraama, mis põhineb Vanast Testamedist tuntud Noa laeva lool. Filmi lavastas julge ja erakordse kaekirja poolest tuntud Darren Aronofsky ("Must luik", "Reekviem unistusele"), selle peaosalisi mangivad Russell Crowe ("Gladiaator") ja Jennifer Connelly ("Piinatud geenius"). Filmi peategelane on Noa, aus ja jumalakartlik pereisa, keda piinavad ilmutused maad ees ootavast katastroofilisest uleujutusest. Tal ei jaa muud ule, kui hakata ehitama hiiglaslikku laeva, kuhu võetakse iga loomaliigi esindajaid, et sugu saaks jatkuda. Aga Noa perekond seisab valusa kusimus ees, kas ka patuse ning allakainud inimkonna esindajad peaks laeva paasema?

programme.title: Kahe maailma vahel
programme.desc: Cannesi filmifestivalil esilinastunud draama. Tuntud kirjanik Marianne Winckler (Juliette Binoche, "Inglise patsient") otsustab, et ta ei soovi enam kuulda tootusest, kriisist ja ebakindlusest nagu need oleks abstraktsed mõisted. Selleks, et kirjutada tõelisest elust otsustab naine minna koristajana toole Prantsusmaa põhjaosas asuvasse sadamalinna. Inimesed on seal vaesed ja pingutavad, et ots-otsaga kokku tulla. Marianne loob nendega sõprussuhted. Aga mis saab siis, kui tuleb paevavalgele tõde, et naine pole mitte vaene lihttooline, vaid hoopis edukas kirjanik?

programme.title: Sassis
programme.desc: Tark õpib teiste vigadest, natuke vahem tark enda vigadest, aga on ka selliseid, kes ei õpi uldse millestki midagi. Evelin on just selline, kes otsides uha uusi suhteid, komistab sama ambri otsa. Olukorrale lisab vurtsi, et tema eksmees osutub naisele uueks bossiks. Andres Maimiku ja Rain Tolki kirjutatud ja lavastatud komoodiasari "Sassis" on 2022 aastal auhinnatud parimaks Eesti telesarjaks. Komoodiasarja osades: Ragne Pekarev, Karin Rask, Tarvo Sõmer, Rain Tolk, Anti Kobin, Velvo Vali, Lotta Lizbeth Hirv, Maria Avdjushko, Annabrith Heinmaa, Paul Samuel Vihmar ja teised.

programme.title: Uus algus
programme.desc: Mait uritab Piretile katte maksta ning teeselda, et tal on ukskõik. Lastekaitse kusitleb Pauli ja Marit ning arvab, et selles peres toimub midagi vaga kahtlast. Kaido kutsub Maidu ja Õe haiglast õhtusoogile, et tahistada pulmi ja ara leppida. Sellest tuleb usna veider õhtusook ning tundub, et Maidu ja Pireti suhe ongi igaveseks purunenud. Kas armastusest uldse enam piisab?

programme.title: Agatha Christie krimilood. Miks nad ei kutsunud Evansit?
programme.desc: Endine merevaelane Bobby Jones ja tema lapsepõlve mangukaaslane Frankie Derwent uhendavad jõud, et kergitada saladuseloori surnud mehe viimastelt sõnadelt: "Miks nad ei kutsunud Evansit?" Frankie ja Bobby sukelduvad uha suvenevasse vandenõusse, põrutades autoga vastu telliskivimuuri, et paaseda peamise kahtlusaluse majja. Frankie teeskleb vigastatut.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: Kassahitist seiklusmarul salaagendist, keda huutakse XXX. Endine kurikael ja adrenaliini-sõltlane XXX varvatakse sunniviisiliselt agendiks ja saadetakse uliohtlikule missioonile. Ta peab imbuma vene maffiasse, kus vahelejaamise korral ootab teda eriti jõhker ja piinarikas surm. Samal ajal ei tohi ta ka politseile vahele jaada, sest ametlikult ei seo teda tema tooandjaga mitte miski...

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: "Reporter+" rõõmustab vaatajaid nadalavahetustel.

programme.title: Rikas Eesti
programme.desc: Peruust parit peruulane Pepe on teinud suua Eesti presidendile, Urmas Sõõrumaale ja Gerd Kanterile. Piret otsustab nii kõrge lennuga valismaise koka viia "juurte juurde" - uheskoos tõtatakse lauta, sest ees ootab lehmalups ning juustu tegemine.

programme.title: Rakett Juunior
programme.desc: Rakett Juuniori kuueteistkumnest veerandfinalistist paases poolfinaalidesse 4 kooli ja just nende seast selguvad Eesti kõige nutikamad noored. Esimeses poolfinaalis võtavad õpilased mõõtu neljas ulesandes. Remondiseina ulesanne paneb nad proovile matemaatikas. Lisaks saavad võistlejad naidata oma teadmisi inimese ehituse ning leiutiste ajaloo kohta. Poolfinaali lõpetab põnev koostooulesanne. Saadet juhib Kristel Aaslaid.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Kas Dana paaseb Bronte kaest vigastusteta? Irene on muserdatud. Kirby mangib Amorit.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Lahendades jarjekordset mõrvalugu paljastab Monk uhe mehe elus nii mõndagi, mis siiani varjus pusinud.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: Kunstiajalootudeng Marie otsib natside varastatud maali, mille leidmiseks tuleb minna maetippu. Hoolimata halvast ilmast asub ta teele. Juhtub õnnetus ja magipaastjad peavad kiiresti tegutsema. Tobias kohtub esmakordselt oma poolõega, kes alustab tood Herbrehteri hotellis. Tobias satub ohtklikku olukorda ja sõidab autoga teelt valja.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Vallavanema naisel tuleb geniaalne idee asutada erakool ja loomulikult satub loogi alla jalle Paavel. Kuidas on võimalik siis oma kallile naisele ara oelda? Koos Kerepaga asub vallavanem otsima koolimajaks sobivaid ruume ja sundvõõrandamise ohvriks langeb Kroosman. Kroosmanile muidugi vallavanema plaan eriti ei meeldi ja ta asub vastupanu osutama. Siit algabki koolisõja otsustavaim lahing. Koolivaimustusest ei paase ka kirikõpetaja, kes asub entusiastlikult rajama Esna usuõpetust, kuid lõpetab nagu alati. Halvasti. Napsitallidel aga algab ettevõtlushooaeg, mida hairib Tola siiras soov saada korralikuks inimeseks. Lõpuks selgub, et naise tujud on nagu tuul valjal. Puua palju tahad - katte ei saa. Ja nõnda rikastub Esna elu taas uhe argise, kuid põneva paeva jagu.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Laiale vaatajaskonnale suunatud uudistemagasin, mis sisaldab uudiseid, sporti, ilmateadet ning ulevaadet paasteameti- ja politseisõnumitest. Lisaks põhiuudiste laienduslood, nahtuste, sundmuste ja persoonide kesksed olemuslood, reportaazhlik malumang jpm.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Kuuuurija
programme.desc: Julge ja kompromissitu Katrin Lust kajastab keerulisi ning tundlikke teemasid, millel on suur sotsiaalne ja uhiskondlik mõju. Selles saates raagime uhest kindlustusjuhtumist, kus inimene kaotas põlengus palju vara, mis oli kindlustatud. Tait summat vara eest, mis ta soovib, ta aga kindlustusfirmast katte ei saa. Kindlustusel on asjadest teine arusaam.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Rahulolematu isa võtab uhe luureuksuse liikme pantvangi, et sundida politseid otsima tema kadunud tutart.

programme.title: Medici - Firenze valitsejad
programme.desc: Lorenzo ja Clarice asuvad oma võimu kinnitamiseks ohtlikule teekonnale, mis avab neile paavstivõimu kõige tumedamad kambrid.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Emily loob Monaga kampa. Ashley naaseb parast hirmuaratava info saamist. Spencerite pere toibub viimasest paugust.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Vallavanema naisel tuleb geniaalne idee asutada erakool ja loomulikult satub loogi alla jalle Paavel. Kuidas on võimalik siis oma kallile naisele ara oelda? Koos Kerepaga asub vallavanem otsima koolimajaks sobivaid ruume ja sundvõõrandamise ohvriks langeb Kroosman. Kroosmanile muidugi vallavanema plaan eriti ei meeldi ja ta asub vastupanu osutama. Siit algabki koolisõja otsustavaim lahing. Koolivaimustusest ei paase ka kirikõpetaja, kes asub entusiastlikult rajama Esna usuõpetust, kuid lõpetab nagu alati. Halvasti. Napsitallidel aga algab ettevõtlushooaeg, mida hairib Tola siiras soov saada korralikuks inimeseks. Lõpuks selgub, et naise tujud on nagu tuul valjal. Puua palju tahad - katte ei saa. Ja nõnda rikastub Esna elu taas uhe argise, kuid põneva paeva jagu.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Rahulolematu isa võtab uhe luureuksuse liikme pantvangi, et sundida politseid otsima tema kadunud tutart.

programme.title: Medici - Firenze valitsejad
programme.desc: Lorenzo ja Clarice asuvad oma võimu kinnitamiseks ohtlikule teekonnale, mis avab neile paavstivõimu kõige tumedamad kambrid.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Laiale vaatajaskonnale suunatud uudistemagasin, mis sisaldab uudiseid, sporti, ilmateadet ning ulevaadet paasteameti- ja politseisõnumitest. Lisaks põhiuudiste laienduslood, nahtuste, sundmuste ja persoonide kesksed olemuslood, reportaazhlik malumang jpm.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Kuuuurija
programme.desc: Katrin Lusti kõmuline ajakirjanduslik telemagasin võtab luubi alla Eesti elu varjatud poole, mis peidab endas põnevaid, kaasahaaravaid ning mõtlemapanevaid lugusid!

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Fenomenaalselt edukas ja pikaealine Austraalia draamasari ookeani-aarse vaikelinna Summer Bay elanike rõõmudest ja muredest, armumistest ja sudamete purunemistest. Sarja trumbiks on haaravad ja inimlikult usutavad tegelaskujud, kelle eludega on vaatajal kerge samastuda. Tegelaste galerii on ka piisavalt mitmekesine, et igauks leiaks endale lemmiku, kellele kaasa elada - siin on nii teismelisi, noori taiskasvanuid kui ka juba kupsesse keskikka jõudnud peategelasi. Lisaboonuseks on Summer Bay igikestev paikesepaiste, mis rõhutab sarja positiivsust ja elurõõmu.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Mõrvaloo lahendamine võtab ootamatu poorde ja Sharonal tuleb Monkiga kõvasti vaeva naha, et asi ei valjuks kontrolli alt.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: Kunstiajalootudeng Marie otsib natside varastatud maali, mille leidmiseks tuleb minna maetippu. Hoolimata halvast ilmast asub ta teele. Juhtub õnnetus ja magipaastjad peavad kiiresti tegutsema. Tobias kohtub esmakordselt oma poolõega, kes alustab tood Herbrehteri hotellis. Tobias satub ohtklikku olukorda ja sõidab autoga teelt valja.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Kui kiriklast varastatakse karu, pole Mihhailova sugugi kindel, et tegemist on kuritooga. Mihhailova arvates võis kirikõpetaja lihtsalt karu ara peita, et toas laisklemist nautida. Kuid parast hirmsat roovimist tema koogis, muudab Mihhailova meelt ja uheskoos kirikõpetajaga asutakse armutu varga jalgi ajama. Selgub, et Esnas on varguste ohvriks langenud veel teisigi kodanikke. Vallavanem puuab kull uhelt poolt hirmsat roovlijõuku peatada, kuid teiselt poolt segab teda tema lihane abikaasa Krista, kes asub võitlema inimõiguste eest. Kerepal ja Varikul ei jaa muud ule, kui meeleheitesse langeda. Kui varguste viies laine jõuab viimaks Kroosmani kasinasse elamisse ning asub laastama ka vallamaja, leiavad Vallavanem ja Varik endas taas jõudu asuda Esna turvalisuse eest halastamatusse võitlusse. Olgu vastaseks siis kasvõi Ämblikmees ise.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Laiale vaatajaskonnale suunatud uudistemagasin, mis sisaldab uudiseid, sporti, ilmateadet ning ulevaadet paasteameti- ja politseisõnumitest. Lisaks põhiuudiste laienduslood, nahtuste, sundmuste ja persoonide kesksed olemuslood, reportaazhlik malumang jpm.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Öokulaline
programme.desc: Kuhu on avalikkusest kadunud Maria Avdjuško, kes veel aastate eest oli Eesti armastatumaid naitlejaid teatris ja filmis? Mart Normet kulastab kunstnike muusat ja tana peamiselt kaadri taga tegutsevat Maria Avdjuškot maalilises Haapsalus, kus ta elab endises kohtumajas, kus mõisteti suudi ka kurikuulus Eesti inimsooja. Õhtusooki teeb Maria koos tutre Adelega, kes lõpetas hiljuti eduka modellikarjaari ning vaatame tõtt majesteetliku kassiga, kes igal hommikul kell 4 perenaise ules ajab. Juttu tuleb ka raskest haigusest ja võitlustest, mis on Maria Avdjuško elu viimastel aastatel mõjutanud. Operaator Kullar Viimne, helioperaator Juhan Vihterpal, režissoor Andreas Lenk, toimetajad Kairit Tsaro-Mirme ja Anne-Mari Muller.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Politseisaade.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Voight ja Olinsky jalitavad kurjategijat, kelle nad kunagi vangi panid.

programme.title: Medici - Firenze valitsejad
programme.desc: Pereliikme kunagine eksimus ahvardab Medicid taas kriisi paisata. Lorenzo peab olukorra paastmiseks ette võtma kahtlase vaartusega samme.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Rosewoodi politsei ajab valelike võrgutajate jalgealust uha tulisemaks. A.D paneb võrgutajad valiku ette, mis loob nende vahele kindla kiilu. Aria avastab midagi šokeerivat.
